electrical_fire.name: Electrical Fire

examine.message: As you lean in to examine the {object_name}, the electrical current arcs violently! Sparks fly toward your face as the fire suddenly intensifies!
Your proximity to the {object_name} seems to agitate the flames - they flare dangerously!

use.message: NEVER USE WATER ON ELECTRICAL FIRES! The {object_name} shorts violently, sending deadly current through the water! The explosion is immediate and devastating!

use.success_message: The fire extinguisher's foam smothers the {object_name}. The electrical fire dies down with a satisfying hiss.
use.failure_message: The fire extinguisher barely affects the {object_name}! The electrical fire reignites almost immediately!

use.message: Using the rubber gloves for protection, you carefully disconnect the power source to the {object_name}. The fire begins to die down.
use.failure_message: Even with rubber gloves, the electrical current is too strong! You're thrown back as sparks fly!

force.message: You force the main electrical disconnect! The power cuts off and the {object_name} begins to cool.
force.failure_message: You can't get enough leverage on the electrical disconnect - and touching it might electrocute you!

water_puddle.message: The electrical fire's current jumps to the nearby water puddle! The entire floor becomes electrified!

gas_leak.message: The electrical sparks ignite the gas leak! The fire becomes a roaring inferno!

sparking.description: Intermittent sparks arc from the {object_name} near the {support_object}, accompanied by an ominous electrical buzzing.

escalation_logic.message: Your presence near the {object_name} seems to destabilize the electrical current!

smoldering.description: Acrid smoke billows from the {object_name} near the {support_object}. The smell of burning plastic and ozone fills the air.

minor_flames.description: Small but persistent flames dance around the {object_name} on the {support_object}, fed by the ongoing electrical current.

flames_erupt.description: The {object_name} is completely engulfed in aggressive electrical flames that crackle and arc with deadly energy!

spreading_inferno.description: The electrical fire has become a raging inferno! Flames shoot from the {object_name} in all directions, and the air itself seems to burn!
spreading_inferno.death_message: The electrical inferno from the {object_name} engulfs you in a torrent of fire and electrical current!

explosion.description: The {object_name} detonates in a brilliant flash of electrical energy and fire! Debris and sparks fly everywhere!
explosion.death_message: You're caught in the devastating electrical explosion from the {object_name}!

explosive_fire.description: The combination of electrical current and gas has created a hellish, explosive fire that defies all attempts at control!
explosive_fire.death_message: The explosive electrical fire incinerates everything in its path, including you!

safely_disconnected.description: The power has been safely cut to the {object_name}. Wisps of smoke still rise from the charred remains near the {support_object}.
safely_disconnected.message_on_state_entry: With the power disconnected, the immediate electrical fire threat has been neutralized.

extinguished.description: The charred, blackened remains of the {object_name} lie dormant near the {support_object}. The smell of burnt electronics lingers.

failsafe_escalation_sequence.message: The electrical fire can no longer be contained!

electrical_fire.removal_message: The electrical hazard has been permanently neutralized.

spreading_fire.name: Spreading Fire

use.message: You spray the extinguisher at the flames, creating a temporary reprieve from the inferno.
use.failure_message: The extinguisher sputters weakly against the roaring flames - it's not enough!

use.message: You splash water on nearby flames, temporarily reducing their intensity.
use.failure_message: The small amount of water evaporates instantly in the heat.

examine.response_message: The fire spreads hungrily across surfaces, consuming everything in its path. The heat is overwhelming.

state_specific_messages.burning_low: Small flames lick at furniture and walls. You might be able to contain this.
state_specific_messages.burning_high: The inferno rages out of control, flames reaching toward the ceiling.
state_specific_messages.flash_ignition: The fire erupts violently, spreading faster than you can track!
state_specific_messages.collapsing_structure: The fire has weakened the building's structure. Debris falls sporadically.

gas_leak.global_message: The fire ignites leaked gas in a devastating explosion!

faulty_wiring.message: The intense heat damages electrical systems, sparking secondary fires!

weak_floorboards.message: The fire weakens the already compromised floor structure!

burning_low.description: Parts of the room are on fire. Flames dance across surfaces while smoke begins to fill the air.
burning_low.global_message_on_entry: You smell smoke and see flickering flames spreading through {room_name}.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: Sparks and embers drift to nearby areas, threatening to spread the fire!

burning_low.duration_message: The fire continues to grow and spread despite efforts to contain it.

burning_high.description: The room is an inferno! Flames crawl up the walls like living things while thick smoke chokes the air.
burning_high.global_message_on_entry: Intense heat and the roar of flames emanate from {room_name}!

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The raging fire spreads aggressively to adjacent areas!
The intense heat begins to compromise the building's structural integrity!

burning_high.escalation_warning: The fire roars with increasing intensity - it's becoming dangerously unstable!

flash_ignition.description: The fire explodes into a devastating flashover! Everything combustible ignites simultaneously in a hellish eruption.
flash_ignition.death_message: The flashover engulfs you in an instant inferno. There is no escape from the consuming flames.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The flashover sends a wave of fire throughout the entire area!
The sudden intense heat causes catastrophic structural failure!

suppressed_flames.description: The fire has been partially suppressed but still smolders dangerously. Wisps of smoke rise from charred surfaces.
suppressed_flames.duration_message: Without continued suppression, the embers begin to reignite.

collapsing_structure.description: The fire has catastrophically weakened the structure! Burning debris falls constantly as the building groans and buckles.

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: Burning debris is falling! DODGE to avoid being crushed!
qte_context.success_message: You narrowly avoid the falling wreckage!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: Burning debris crashes down upon you!

extinguished.description: The fire has been successfully extinguished, leaving behind smoke-stained walls and the acrid smell of burnt materials.
extinguished.progression_message: Hidden embers suddenly flare back to life!

burnt_out_ruins.description: The room is a devastated, smoking ruin. Charred debris litters the floor, and the walls are blackened with soot.

structural_collapse_death.description: The building succumbs to the fire's devastation in a catastrophic collapse.
structural_collapse_death.death_message: The burning structure collapses around you in a crushing avalanche of debris and flame.

spreading_fire.removal_message: The fire finally dies down, leaving behind a scene of devastation.

weak_floorboards.name: Weak Floorboards

examine.message: As you examine the {object_name} more closely, you notice deep cracks and hear ominous groaning from the support beams below.

jump.message: You foolishly jump on the {object_name}! The boards immediately buckle and crack under the sudden impact!

jump_on.message: The moment your full weight lands on the {object_name}, you hear a sickening crack as the wood begins to splinter!

stomp.message: Your stomping causes the {object_name} to crack and sag dangerously! You may have just sealed your fate!

force.message: Your forceful movement puts tremendous strain on the already weakened {object_name}!

water_damage.message: The moisture has further weakened the already compromised {object_name}.

stable.description: The floorboards appear solid, though there's an occasional creak that suggests age and wear.

creaking.description: The floorboards groan and creak with every step, producing an unsettling symphony of stressed wood.

stressed.description: The floorboards sag visibly under weight, with deep cracks appearing in the wood. Each step feels precarious.

acute_stress.description: The floorboards are severely compromised, bowing dangerously and producing alarming cracking sounds with any movement.

status_effect_per_turn_in_room.message: The unstable floor makes you feel anxious and unsteady.

imminent_collapse.description: The floorboards are on the verge of total failure. Deep cracks run through multiple boards, and the floor sags ominously.

status_effect_per_turn_in_room.message: The shifting floor makes you feel unsteady and disoriented.

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: The floor is giving way! Maintain your balance!
qte_context.success_message: You carefully distribute your weight and avoid putting too much pressure on the weakened boards.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You lose your footing as the boards shift beneath you!

partial_collapse.description: Part of the floor has given way, creating a dangerous hole surrounded by jagged, splintered boards.

status_effect_per_turn_in_room.message: You cut yourself on the jagged, splintered wood around the hole.

major_collapse.description: The floor has completely collapsed! A gaping hole reveals the space below, surrounded by treacherous debris and unstable remaining boards.

status_effect_per_turn_in_room.message: The debris and sharp wood edges cause cuts and scrapes as you navigate carefully.

catastrophic_failure.description: The structural failure has spread! Multiple sections of flooring have collapsed, creating a dangerous maze of holes, debris, and unstable surfaces.

status_effect_per_turn_in_room.message: Navigating through the debris field causes multiple cuts and injuries.

porch_collapse_fall.description: The porch floorboards give way completely! You plummet through the rotted wood toward the ground below!
porch_collapse_fall.death_message: You crash through the rotted porch floorboards and plummet to the rocky ground below, your neck snapping on impact with a sickening crack.

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: Grab onto something! The porch is collapsing!
qte_context.success_message: You manage to grab the porch railing and pull yourself to safety!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't find anything to grab as you fall through the collapsing porch!

living_room_floor_cave_in.description: The living room floor caves in, revealing the basement below! Debris and dust fill the air as you struggle to maintain your footing.

attic_floor_collapse_fatal.description: The attic floor gives way beneath you! You plummet through multiple floors in a cascade of splintering wood and debris!
attic_floor_collapse_fatal.death_message: You crash through the attic floor, then the ceiling below, finally slamming into the ground floor with bone-crushing force. Your body is broken by the multi-story fall.

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: The attic floor is collapsing! Find something to grab!
qte_context.success_message: You grab onto a roof beam and swing to safety as the floor collapses below you!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You fall through the collapsing attic floor!

weak_floorboards.removal_message: The structural damage to the {object_name} has been temporarily stabilized, though it remains unsafe.

faulty_wiring.name: Faulty Wiring

escalation_logic.message: The {object_name} near you arcs violently, attracted to your metallic items!
Your contact with metal conducts the electrical discharge!

failsafe_escalation_sequence.message: The electrical system is deteriorating rapidly!

exposed.description: Some wires look dangerously exposed near the {support_object}.

examine.message: As you lean in to examine the {object_name}, they suddenly start sparking!

sparking.description: The {object_name} on the {support_object} are emitting dangerous sparks!

gas_leak.message: The sparks from {source_hazard_object} ignite the gas from the {target_hazard_object}!

damaged_wall_gas_leak.message: The sparks from the {source_hazard_object} arc towards the flammable gas from the {target_hazard_object}!

spreading_fire.message: The electrical sparks intensify the nearby {target_hazard_object}!

arcing.description: The {object_name} is arcing violently, sending dangerous electrical discharges across the room!
arcing.death_message: You're struck by a powerful electrical arc from the {object_name}!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: The arcing wires are about to discharge! Quick reaction needed!
qte_context.success_message: You leap clear of the deadly electrical discharge!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The electrical arc strikes you with devastating force!

electrical_fire.description: The {object_name} has ignited into an electrical fire, spreading dangerous flames!

electrical_explosion.description: The electrical system explodes in a shower of sparks and debris!
electrical_explosion.death_message: You're caught in the devastating electrical explosion!

electrocution_hazard.description: The {object_name} are conducting a deadly current through nearby metal objects!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: Electrical current is flowing through metal! Drop metallic items or find insulation!
qte_context.success_message: You quickly drop your metallic items and avoid electrocution!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The electrical current courses through your metallic items!

shorted_out.description: The {object_name} on the {support_object} look dead and are smoking slightly.

use.message: Disturbing the {object_name} causes them to spark back to life!

destroyed.description: The electrical system has been completely destroyed by the explosion.
destroyed.removal_message: The destroyed electrical components are no longer a threat.

examine.message: As you examine the {object_name}, your proximity causes them to suddenly start sparking!
You get too close to the {object_name} and receive a painful shock!

use.message: You manage to safely insulate the {object_name} with your protective equipment.
Using rubber gloves, you carefully disconnect the {object_name}.
You use your tool to safely disconnect the {object_name}.
Using a conductive item near the {object_name} results in a severe shock!

touch.message: You receive a minor shock from the {object_name}!
You foolishly touch the sparking {object_name} and get severely shocked!
Touching the arcing {object_name} sends a fatal electrical current through your body!

force.message: Forcing the {object_name} causes them to arc dangerously!

_check_electrical_proximity_effects.description: Checks for electrical interference with nearby metal objects and players

_electrical_discharge_cascade.description: Creates cascading electrical effects in the room

_spread_electrical_fire.description: Spreads electrical fire to nearby flammable objects

decay.decay_message: The {object_name} finally burn out and go dead.

faulty_wiring.removal_message: The electrical hazard has been neutralized and the {object_name} are now safe.

gas_leak.name: Gas Leak

examine.message: You investigate the {object_name}. The smell of gas intensifies, and you hear a faint hiss.

use.message_success: You manage to tighten the {object_name}, and the hissing stops. The smell of gas lessens.
use.message_failure: The wrench slips! The valve is too corroded to turn properly.

use.message_success: You wrap duct tape around the leak. It's a temporary fix, but the hissing stops.
use.message_failure: The tape won't stick properly to the gas-slicked surface!

use.message_success: You flick the lighter near the {object_name}. The gas ignites with a terrifying WHOOSH!
use.message_failure: You try to ignite the gas, but the lighter sputters out. The leak continues.

force.message: You attempt to force the valve, but it snaps! Gas begins pouring out rapidly!

faulty_wiring.message: A spark from the faulty wiring ignites the accumulated gas!

spreading_fire.message: The fire reaches the gas leak with catastrophic results!

faint_smell.description: There's a faint, sweet smell of gas near the {object_name} on the {support_object}.
faint_smell.global_message_on_entry: You catch a whiff of something sweet and chemical in the air.

hissing_leak.description: A steady hiss comes from the {object_name} on the {support_object}, and the smell of gas is stronger.

moderate_leak.description: Gas hisses loudly from the {object_name} on the {support_object}. The air shimmers slightly with vapors.

status_effect_per_turn_in_room.name: dizzy
status_effect_per_turn_in_room.message: The gas fumes make you feel lightheaded.

heavy_leak.description: The smell of gas from the {object_name} on the {support_object} is overpowering. The air feels thick and dangerous.

status_effect_on_room_entry.name: dizzy
status_effect_on_room_entry.message: The concentrated gas fumes hit you immediately, making you dizzy.

critical_accumulation.description: Gas pours from the {object_name} on the {support_object} in a visible stream. The air is dangerously saturated.

status_effect_on_state_change.name: poisoned
status_effect_on_state_change.message: The toxic gas concentration makes you violently ill.

critical_accumulation.global_message_on_entry: A dangerous hissing sound echoes through the building.

imminent_explosion.description: The {object_name} on the {support_object} screams with escaping gas. The air is a deadly cocktail waiting for ignition.

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: Type 'EVACUATE' to flee the building before the gas explodes!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You're too slow! The explosion catches you!

ignited.description: The leaking gas from the {object_name} on the {support_object} ignites with a terrifying WHOOSH!
ignited.death_message: The room erupts in a fireball as the gas ignites! You're instantly incinerated.

explosive_ignition.description: The accumulated gas explodes in a devastating fireball that rocks the entire building!
explosive_ignition.death_message: The gas explosion tears through the room with the force of a bomb! You're vaporized instantly.

temporarily_patched.description: The {object_name} on the {support_object} is wrapped in duct tape, temporarily stopping the leak.

patch_failing.description: The duct tape on the {object_name} is starting to peel away. Gas begins to seep out again.
patch_failing.message: The makeshift patch on the {object_name} is failing!

sealed_leak.description: The {object_name} on the {support_object} appears to be properly sealed. The smell of gas is fading.
sealed_leak.message: You've successfully stopped the gas leak.

new_leak_developing.description: Despite your repairs, a new leak has developed in the {object_name} on the {support_object}.
new_leak_developing.message: Your repair job was only temporary - gas is leaking again!

ruptured_pipe.description: The {object_name} on the {support_object} is completely ruptured, spewing gas into the air!
ruptured_pipe.message: Gas pours out of the damaged {object_name}!

post_explosion_safe.description: The area where the {object_name} was located is now a blackened, destroyed mess.
post_explosion_safe.message: The explosion has destroyed the gas source, but left devastation in its wake.

autonomous_actions._check_ignition_sources: Monitors for sparks or flames that could ignite gas
autonomous_actions._monitor_explosion_conditions: Checks if conditions are right for explosion
autonomous_actions._create_explosion_damage: Handles explosion effects on room and adjacent areas
autonomous_actions._trigger_building_wide_explosion: Creates massive explosion affecting multiple rooms

gas_leak.removal_message: The {object_name} has been permanently sealed or destroyed.

examine.message: You look up at the {object_name}. The mounting seems loose, and you notice hairline cracks in the ceiling around the fixture. Frayed wiring is visible near its base.
The {object_name} is definitely unsteady. As you watch, a small chunk of plaster falls from around the mounting bracket. Best not to linger underneath.
The {object_name} is sparking dangerously and wobbling violently! The entire ceiling mount is visibly separating from the structure!
The {object_name} is a death trap waiting to happen! Sparks shower down like deadly rain, and the whole assembly groans ominously.

use.message: You try to operate the {object_name}. It lurches to life with a grinding noise and starts to wobble more noticeably.
The {object_name} is already unstable, but you activate it anyway. The rotation creates violent oscillations that shake the entire mounting!
The sparking {object_name} is far too dangerous to operate! You'd be insane to touch those controls!

force_operate.message: You forcefully operate the {object_name} despite the obvious danger. It immediately begins spinning erratically as sparks fly from its base!
You force the already-failing {object_name} to operate! This triggers immediate catastrophic failure!

turn_off.message: You quickly turn off the {object_name}. The wobbling gradually decreases, but the structural damage is already done.
You try to turn off the {object_name}, but the electrical system is too damaged! The controls don't respond!

secure.message: Using your tools, you tighten the mounting bolts on the {object_name}. It's more stable now, but this is only a temporary fix.
You wrap duct tape around the mounting bracket of the {object_name}. It's a desperate measure that might buy you some time.

duck.message: You duck just as the {object_name} crashes down! It misses you by inches, embedding one of its blades in the floor where you were standing!

structural_vibration.message: Vibrations cause the {object_name} to resonate, amplifying its wobbling!

explosion_nearby.message: The explosion damages the {object_name}'s mounting and electrical systems!

electrical_surge.message: An electrical surge overloads the {object_name}'s motor, causing violent spinning!

high_temperature.message: Heat causes the metal mounting to expand, loosening the {object_name}!

water_damage.message: Water damage compromises the {object_name}'s electrical safety!

gas_leak.message: Sparks from the {source_hazard_object} ignite the gas from the {target_hazard_object}!

faulty_wiring.message: The electrical problems cascade between the {source_hazard_object} and {target_hazard_object}!

stable.description: An {object_name} hangs overhead, its blades still. The mounting looks questionable, and frayed wiring is visible near its base. A few small cracks spider web out from the ceiling fixture.

natural_deterioration.description: Age and gravity are taking their toll on the {object_name}. The mounting bracket shows signs of metal fatigue, and occasional creaks suggest the ceiling attachment is weakening.

minor_wobble.description: The {object_name} exhibits a slight, persistent wobble even when motionless. Dust occasionally falls from the fixture, and you can see the mounting bracket shifting slightly.

wobbling.description: The {object_name} overhead creaks and wobbles precariously! Each slight air current sets it swaying, and the ceiling around the mounting shows widening cracks.
wobbling.warning_message: The {object_name} is becoming increasingly unstable! You should leave this room now!

structural_stress.description: The mounting of the {object_name} is under severe stress! Visible cracks run across the ceiling, and the fixture sways ominously with each wobble. Chunks of plaster rain down periodically.

critical_mounting_failure.description: The {object_name} is barely hanging on! The mounting bracket is visibly separating from the ceiling, held by perhaps one or two bolts. The entire assembly groans and shifts with any movement.

electrical_short_risk.description: Water damage has compromised the {object_name}'s electrical system. The wiring sparks intermittently, and there's a distinct smell of burning insulation.

sparking_wobble.description: Sparks erupt from the base of the {object_name} as it sways dangerously! The electrical system is failing, creating a shower of sparks that could ignite anything flammable.

electrical_fire_risk.description: The {object_name} is now a cascading electrical disaster! Continuous sparks shower down while the fan wobbles violently. The smell of burning plastic fills the air.
electrical_fire_risk.death_message: The electrical fire from the {object_name} spreads rapidly, consuming you in flames!

violent_oscillation.description: Your activation of the damaged {object_name} creates violent oscillations! The entire fixture swings in wide, unpredictable arcs as the motor fights against the unbalanced blades.

resonance_amplification.description: External vibrations have triggered resonance in the {object_name}! It oscillates with increasing amplitude, the wobbling growing more violent with each cycle.

structural_resonance_failure.description: The resonance has reached critical levels! The {object_name} swings in impossibly wide arcs, and you can hear the ceiling itself groaning as the mounting tears free!

blast_damage.description: The explosion has severely damaged the {object_name}! The mounting is twisted, several blades are bent, and sparks fly from damaged electrical connections.

motor_overload.description: The electrical surge has overloaded the {object_name}'s motor! It spins at dangerous speeds while smoke pours from the motor housing.

thermal_expansion_stress.description: Heat is causing the metal components of the {object_name} to expand! The mounting bolts are loosening as the metal expands, and the fixture creaks ominously.

imminent_collapse_qte.description: The {object_name} is about to fall! You can see the last mounting bolt beginning to pull free from the ceiling!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THE CEILING FAN IS FALLING! Type 'dive away' or 'roll sideways'!
qte_context.success_message: You dive away just as the {object_name} crashes to the floor with a thunderous crash! One of its blades embeds in the wall where your head was moments before.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You roll sideways as the {object_name} plummets down! It crashes beside you, its blades spinning dangerously close to your body before finally stopping.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate a moment too long! The heavy {object_name} crashes down on you!

forced_malfunction_qte.description: Your forced operation has triggered immediate failure! The {object_name} spins wildly out of control, throwing off balance weights and debris!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: DEBRIS FLYING EVERYWHERE! Type 'shield head' or 'duck and cover'!
qte_context.success_message: You shield your head as debris flies everywhere! A chunk of metal whistles past your ear, but you're protected from the worst of it.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You drop to the floor and cover your head! Debris rains down around you, but your low profile saves you from serious injury.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You stand frozen as debris pelts you from all directions! A heavy piece of the motor housing strikes you in the head!

catastrophic_failure_qte.description: Your reckless activation triggers total system failure! The {object_name} explodes apart while still spinning at high speed!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THE FAN IS EXPLODING! Type 'hit the deck' to get down!
qte_context.success_message: You throw yourself to the floor as the {object_name} disintegrates above you! Blades and motor parts embed themselves in the walls around you.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't react fast enough! The exploding fan sends a blade spinning directly at you!

electrical_fire_cascade_qte.description: The electrical fire from the {object_name} is spreading to other wiring in the ceiling! The entire electrical system is about to cascade failure!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: ELECTRICAL FIRE SPREADING! Type 'cut main power' or 'evacuate immediately'!
qte_context.success_message: You find the main electrical panel and cut power to the whole circuit! The fire dies immediately, but the {object_name} is now a charred wreck.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You evacuate as the electrical fire spreads through the ceiling! Behind you, the room erupts in sparks and flame.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate too long! The electrical cascade reaches critical mass!

centrifugal_destruction_qte.description: The violent oscillations are tearing the {object_name} apart! Parts are flying off in all directions as centrifugal force destroys the assembly!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: PARTS FLYING EVERYWHERE! Type 'seek cover' or 'catch falling pieces'!
qte_context.success_message: You dive behind furniture as the {object_name} tears itself apart! Metal pieces embed in the walls around your hiding spot.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: In a moment of insanity, you try to catch some of the smaller falling pieces! You're struck by debris but manage to avoid the larger, lethal chunks.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You stand mesmerized by the destruction! A heavy piece of the motor assembly flies directly at your head!

motor_explosion_qte.description: The overloaded motor is about to explode! Smoke pours from the housing and you can hear components rattling violently inside!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: MOTOR EXPLOSION IMMINENT! Type 'run for exit' to escape!
qte_context.success_message: You sprint for the exit as the motor explodes behind you! Hot metal shrapnel embeds in the doorframe as you escape.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate! The motor explodes with tremendous force, sending hot shrapnel in all directions!

resonance_collapse_qte.description: The resonance has reached catastrophic levels! The entire ceiling fixture is tearing free in slow motion!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: RESONANCE COLLAPSE! Type 'time the oscillation' to escape between swings!
qte_context.success_message: You carefully time the oscillations and dash to safety between swings! The {object_name} tears completely free just as you clear the danger zone.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You misjudge the timing! The wildly swinging {object_name} catches you mid-escape!

impact_failure_qte.description: The blast damage has left the {object_name} hanging by twisted metal! It's about to fall in an unpredictable direction!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: UNPREDICTABLE FALL PATTERN! Type 'watch and react' to respond to its movement!
qte_context.success_message: You watch the twisted metal carefully and react to its fall pattern! You dodge successfully as it crashes in an unexpected direction.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You guess wrong about the fall direction! The damaged {object_name} falls directly onto you!

thermal_failure_qte.description: The thermal expansion has loosened all the bolts! The {object_name} drops suddenly but catches on one last connection!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THERMAL FAILURE! Type 'back away slowly' to avoid triggering the final drop!
qte_context.success_message: You back away slowly, avoiding any vibrations that might trigger the final failure. The {object_name} hangs precariously but doesn't fall... yet.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: Your movement triggers the final failure! The last connection snaps and the {object_name} plummets!

temporarily_secured.description: Your tool work has stabilized the {object_name} for now. The mounting is tighter, but the underlying structural problems remain.

makeshift_reinforcement.description: The duct tape around the {object_name}'s mounting provides some reinforcement, but it's clearly a temporary measure. The tape is already showing stress marks.

reinforcement_failure.description: Your makeshift reinforcement is failing! The duct tape is stretching and tearing under the stress, and the wobbling is getting worse again.

emergency_shutdown.description: You've successfully turned off the {object_name}, reducing the immediate danger. However, the structural damage has already been done.

shutdown_attempt_failure.description: The controls don't respond! The {object_name} continues its dangerous operation despite your attempts to shut it down. The electrical system is too damaged.

crashed_safely.description: The {object_name} lies shattered on the floor, but you escaped unharmed. The ceiling above shows a gaping hole where the fixture used to be.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The impact shakes more debris loose from the damaged ceiling!

close_call_aftermath.description: You barely escaped the falling {object_name}! Its blades are still spinning inches from your body as it lies on its side. That was way too close.

electrical_shutdown_success.description: Your quick action prevented an electrical fire from spreading. The {object_name} is now a charred, lifeless hulk, but the danger has passed.

motor_explosion_aftermath.description: You escaped just in time! The room behind you is filled with smoke and hot metal debris from the exploded motor.

destruction_aftermath.description: The {object_name} has completely destroyed itself through centrifugal force. Metal parts are embedded in every wall, but you survived the mechanical carnage.

resonance_escape_success.description: Your perfect timing allowed you to escape the resonance collapse. The {object_name} now hangs at an impossible angle, finally still.

catastrophic_survival.description: You survived the catastrophic explosion of the {object_name}! The room looks like a war zone, but you're alive.

impact_aftermath.description: The blast-damaged {object_name} has finally fallen, but your quick reactions saved you from its unpredictable trajectory.

thermal_stabilization.description: Your careful movement prevented the final thermal failure. The {object_name} hangs precariously but is no longer actively failing.

debris_injury_state.description: You're battered by flying debris from the {object_name}, but you're still alive. Pain shoots through your body from multiple impacts.

debris_survival.description: Your quick thinking saved you from the worst of the debris, but you still took some hits. You're bruised but functional.

debris_catcher_injured.description: Your insane attempt to catch falling pieces resulted in multiple cuts and bruises, but somehow you avoided the lethal chunks.

shrapnel_injury_state.description: Hot metal shrapnel from the motor explosion has peppered your body. You're wounded but alive.

resonance_strike_injury.description: The wildly oscillating {object_name} struck you, but not with enough force to be fatal. You're injured and dazed.

thermal_drop_injury.description: The thermally-failed {object_name} fell on you, but your partial dodge reduced the impact. You're hurt but not crushed.

death_by_falling_fan.description: The massive {object_name} crashes down with all its weight focused on your body. The impact is immediately fatal.
death_by_falling_fan.death_message: Crushed by a falling ceiling fan after ignoring multiple warnings.

death_by_blade_projectile.description: A spinning blade from the exploding {object_name} acts like a giant shuriken, slicing through you with lethal precision.
death_by_blade_projectile.death_message: Decapitated by a spinning blade from an exploding ceiling fan.

electrical_cascade_death.description: The electrical fire cascade consumes the entire room. You're caught in a web of electrical death.
electrical_cascade_death.death_message: Killed in an electrical fire cascade that started with a ceiling fan.

death_by_centrifugal_debris.description: A heavy piece of the motor housing, flung by centrifugal force, strikes you with tremendous kinetic energy.
death_by_centrifugal_debris.death_message: Killed by centrifugally-launched debris from a destroying ceiling fan.

death_by_impact_crush.description: The explosion-damaged {object_name} falls in an impossible trajectory, crushing you under its twisted metal frame.
death_by_impact_crush.death_message: Crushed by an unpredictably falling ceiling fan damaged by explosion.

electrical_fire_death.description: The electrical fire from the {object_name} spreads faster than you can escape. You're consumed by electrical flames.
electrical_fire_death.death_message: Burned alive in an electrical fire from a sparking ceiling fan.

electrical_fire_spread.description: The electrical fire from the {object_name} spreads throughout the ceiling, turning the entire room into an electrical inferno.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: Electrical fire spreads throughout the room!

short_circuit_failure.description: The {object_name} shorts out completely in a shower of sparks before falling silent and dead.

sympathetic_electrical_failure.description: The electrical problems cascade through multiple systems, causing the {object_name} to fail along with other electrical components.

malfunction_aftermath.description: The {object_name} has suffered a complete malfunction and now hangs motionless, damaged beyond repair. Debris litters the floor below.

fallen.description: The wreckage of the {object_name} lies shattered on the floor. The ceiling above shows a gaping hole where the fixture was torn free, and debris continues to fall occasionally.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.trigger_message: The impact of the {source_name} shakes dust and debris from the damaged ceiling!

narrow_miss.description: You successfully ducked! The {object_name} crashes to the floor beside you, one of its blades embedding deep in the wooden floorboards inches from where you were standing.

examine.message: A {object_name}, clearly marked with biohazard symbols. It seems sealed... mostly. You notice the lid is slightly askew and there's a suspicious dark stain around the base.
As you lean closer to examine the {object_name}, the noxious fumes make your eyes water and throat burn. Your proximity seems to be making it worse!
The {object_name} has created a nightmare of biological contamination. The smell is overwhelming and you can see the toxic waste eating away at the floor itself.

search.message: You try to pry open the {object_name}. The seal resists, then suddenly gives way with a wet *POP*! Noxious gas immediately begins escaping!
You force open the already-compromised {object_name}! The pressure inside causes it to rupture violently!

open.message: You deliberately open the {object_name}. This is an extremely dangerous decision!

kick.message: You kick the {object_name} in frustration! The impact causes its weakened structure to fail catastrophically!

use.message: You spray the fire extinguisher at the {object_name}! The chemical foam begins neutralizing some of the toxic gases.
You ignite the vapors from the {object_name}! The toxic gases burst into flames with a horrifying blue-green fire!
You pour water on the spilled waste! The mixture begins to foam and bubble violently!

seal.message: You hastily wrap duct tape around the {object_name}, creating a temporary seal. The tape immediately begins discoloring from the chemicals.

high_temperature.message: The heat accelerates decomposition in the {object_name}, building dangerous pressure!

electrical_spark_nearby.message: Sparks near the {object_name} threaten to ignite the toxic vapors!

water_contact.message: Water contact spreads the contamination from the {object_name}!

structural_damage.message: Structural damage causes the {object_name} to rupture!

faulty_wiring.message: Sparks from the {target_hazard_object} ignite the toxic vapors from the {source_hazard_object}!

water_puddle.message: The toxic waste from the {source_hazard_object} spreads into the {target_hazard_object}, creating a larger contaminated area!

sealed.description: A {object_name} sits in the corner, seemingly secure. Warning labels cover its surface, and you can hear a faint bubbling sound from within.

internal_pressure.description: The {object_name} bulges slightly, its seal straining. The bubbling sound has become more pronounced, suggesting active decomposition inside.

breach_warning.description: A thin stream of noxious vapor hisses from the {object_name}! The container is under significant pressure and beginning to fail.

leaking_fumes.description: The {object_name} is clearly compromised, releasing a steady stream of toxic vapors. The air shimmers with noxious fumes and the smell is overwhelming.

pressure_buildup.description: The {object_name} swells dangerously as gases build pressure inside! Toxic vapor pours out in visible clouds, and the container creaks ominously.

rupture_imminent_qte.description: The {object_name} is about to rupture explosively! Toxic pressure has reached critical levels!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: TOXIC RUPTURE IMMINENT!'Evacuate' the room or 'contain' the breach!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You grab a nearby protective covering and attempt to contain the breach! The rupture is violent but partially contained.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate too long! The {object_name} ruptures violently, spraying you with toxic waste!

intentional_breach_qte.description: You deliberately open the sealed container! This is extremely dangerous!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: OPENING BIOHAZARD CONTAINER! Type 'hold breath' or 'use protection'!
qte_context.success_message: You hold your breath and quickly reseal the container! You avoided the worst of the exposure.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: Using protective gear, you safely examine the contents before resealing. Smart thinking!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You breathe in a lungful of toxic vapors as you open the container! Your respiratory system is immediately compromised!

violent_rupture_qte.description: Your actions trigger an immediate, violent rupture! Toxic waste explodes everywhere!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: TOXIC EXPLOSION! Type 'dive away' to escape the spray!
qte_context.success_message: You dive away as toxic waste erupts from the container! You're splashed but avoided the worst of it.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The toxic explosion catches you full force! Corrosive waste burns your skin and fills your lungs!

toxic_fire_qte.description: The toxic vapors ignite with a horrifying blue-green flame! Chemical fire spreads rapidly!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: TOXIC FIRE! Type 'smother flames' or 'evacuate immediately'!
qte_context.success_message: You smother the chemical fire before it spreads! The toxic smoke is contained but still dangerous.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You evacuate as the toxic fire consumes the area! Behind you, the chemical flames burn with unnatural colors.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The chemical fire spreads faster than you anticipated! Toxic smoke fills your lungs!

dilution_reaction_qte.description: Water contacts the toxic waste! The mixture foams violently and releases even more dangerous vapors!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: VIOLENT CHEMICAL REACTION! Type 'neutralize reaction' or 'escape vapors'!
qte_context.success_message: You quickly apply neutralizing agents to stop the reaction! The foaming subsides but the area remains contaminated.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You escape the immediate area as the reaction produces a cloud of toxic vapor! You avoid the worst of the exposure.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The chemical reaction overwhelms you! Concentrated toxic vapors burn your respiratory system!

contamination_exposure_qte.description: You're covered in toxic waste! You need immediate decontamination or the exposure will be fatal!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: TOXIC CONTAMINATION! Type 'emergency shower' or 'chemical wash'!
qte_context.success_message: You find an emergency shower and wash off most of the toxic waste! You're injured but the contamination is controlled.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You use chemical neutralizing agents to wash off the toxic waste! Professional decontamination saves your life.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't find adequate decontamination! The toxic waste continues burning through your skin and poisoning your system!

direct_poisoning_qte.description: Toxic vapors are burning your lungs! You need immediate medical intervention!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: TOXIC POISONING! Type 'antidote' or 'oxygen mask'!
qte_context.success_message: You find and administer an antidote! The toxic effects are partially neutralized, but you're severely weakened.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You get on an oxygen mask, helping your lungs process the toxins! You're hurt but stable.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: Without treatment, the toxic vapors destroy your respiratory system! You collapse, gasping for air that will never come.

thermal_expansion.description: Heat accelerates the decomposition inside the {object_name}! Pressure builds rapidly as toxic gases expand and multiply.

structural_weakness.description: Vibrations have compromised the {object_name}'s structural integrity! Cracks are visible in its surface and toxic waste is beginning to seep out.

vapor_ignition_warning.description: Electrical sparks near the {object_name} create a terrifying risk! The toxic vapors are highly flammable and a single spark could ignite them!
vapor_ignition_warning.death_message: The toxic vapors ignite explosively, consuming you in chemical fire!

spontaneous_ignition_qte.description: The toxic vapors reach auto-ignition temperature! Chemical fire erupts spontaneously!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: SPONTANEOUS IGNITION! Type 'run' immediately!
qte_context.success_message: You sprint away as the vapors ignite behind you! The chemical fire spreads rapidly but you're clear!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The spontaneous chemical fire engulfs you before you can react!

impact_rupture.description: Physical impact causes the {object_name} to rupture violently! Toxic waste sprays in all directions as the container fails catastrophically!

accelerated_decomposition.description: Your proximity to the {object_name} has accelerated the decomposition process! The biological agents inside are producing toxic gases at an alarming rate!

spilled.description: The {object_name} has been completely compromised! Toxic waste spreads across the floor in a growing puddle of contamination. The air is thick with deadly vapors.
spilled.death_message: You slip in the toxic waste and are overcome by contamination. The toxins shut down your organs one by one.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The toxic spill spreads across the floor!

toxic_puddle.description: The spill from the {object_name} has formed a large, toxic puddle that's eating through the floor! Vapors rise from the corrosive mixture, and you can hear it hissing as it dissolves everything it touches.
toxic_puddle.death_message: Contact with the toxic puddle causes immediate organ failure. Death is swift but agonizing.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The toxic waste is eating through the floor structure!

makeshift_seal.description: Your duct tape seal is holding the {object_name} together, but the tape is rapidly discoloring and weakening from chemical exposure. It's a temporary solution at best.

seal_failure.description: Your makeshift seal is failing! The duct tape is dissolving from chemical exposure and toxic vapors are escaping around the edges!

delayed_rupture.description: The failed seal causes a delayed but violent rupture! The {object_name} explodes with even more force due to the pressure buildup!
delayed_rupture.death_message: The delayed rupture catches you unprepared. The concentrated toxic exposure is instantly fatal.

chemical_neutralization.description: The fire extinguisher chemicals partially neutralize the toxic vapors from the {object_name}, but the reaction creates a different kind of hazard - corrosive foam that's spreading.

neutralization_aftermath.description: The neutralization reaction has stabilized, but the area is now covered in corrosive foam. The immediate toxic threat is reduced but new dangers have emerged.

dilution_contamination.description: Water contact with the {object_name} spreads the contamination over a much wider area! The diluted toxins are now covering more of the room.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: Contaminated water spreads across the room!

diluted_spread.description: The contamination has spread throughout the water system! Every wet surface in the area is now potentially toxic.

contained_rupture_aftermath.description: You successfully evacuated before the rupture! The room behind you is now a toxic wasteland, but you're safe.

partial_containment_success.description: Your containment efforts reduced the severity of the rupture! The contamination is limited to a smaller area.

controlled_exposure.description: You minimized your exposure to the toxic contents. You're slightly affected but avoided serious contamination.

protected_examination_success.description: Using proper protection, you safely examined the container contents and learned valuable information without contamination.

fire_suppression_success.description: You successfully suppressed the chemical fire before it could spread! The area is toxic but not burning.

decontamination_success.description: Emergency decontamination saved your life! You're injured but the toxic exposure has been controlled.

professional_decontamination_success.description: Professional-grade decontamination completely neutralized the toxic exposure! You survived with minimal effects.

antidote_recovery.description: The antidote counteracted the worst effects of the toxic exposure. You're weakened but alive.

oxygen_treatment_success.description: Oxygen treatment helped your lungs process the toxins. You're hurt but your respiratory system is recovering.

splash_contamination.description: You're splashed with toxic waste but avoided the worst of the exposure. You need immediate medical attention.

chemical_burn_injury.description: The chemical reaction caused severe burns. You're in pain but the contamination is contained.

vapor_cloud_aftermath.description: You escaped the immediate vapor cloud but the area remains highly contaminated. You have minor exposure effects.

toxic_death_violent.description: The massive toxic exposure overwhelms your body's ability to cope. Your organs shut down in rapid succession.
toxic_death_violent.death_message: Killed by massive toxic exposure from a violently ruptured biohazard container.

toxic_smoke_death.description: The toxic smoke from the chemical fire destroys your respiratory system. You collapse, choking on poisonous vapors.
toxic_smoke_death.death_message: Died from toxic smoke inhalation during a chemical fire.

contamination_death.description: Without proper decontamination, the toxic waste burns through your skin and poisons your system. Death comes slowly and painfully.
contamination_death.death_message: Died from toxic contamination due to inadequate decontamination.

respiratory_failure_death.description: The toxic vapors destroy your lungs from the inside. You suffocate as your respiratory system fails completely.
respiratory_failure_death.death_message: Died from respiratory failure due to toxic vapor inhalation.

spontaneous_fire_death.description: The spontaneous chemical fire consumes you before you can react. The toxic flames burn with unnatural heat.
spontaneous_fire_death.death_message: Consumed by spontaneous chemical fire from toxic vapors.

toxic_fire_spread.description: The chemical fire spreads beyond containment, turning the entire area into a toxic inferno. Anyone remaining is doomed.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: Chemical fire spreads throughout the area!

player.message: The {object_name} zips past, snagging a loose appliance cord and wrapping it around your ankle, tangling you up!

loose_object.message: The {object_name} rams into the {target_object_name}, sending it teetering dangerously!

spillable_container.message: The {object_name} crashes into a container, spilling its contents everywhere!

unstable_shelf.message: The {object_name} slams into the shelf support, causing the entire structure to shake!

electrical_appliance.message: The {object_name} interferes with nearby electronics, causing them to spark and malfunction!

water_puddle.message: The {object_name} drives directly into a puddle! Water splashes and its internal electronics begin to fizz and spark!

appliance_cord_in_water.message: The {object_name} drags a plugged-in appliance cord into a water puddle, causing a dangerous electrical hazard!

cleaning_chemical_bottle.message: The {object_name} knocks over a bottle of cleaning chemicals, creating a toxic puddle!

examine.message: The {object_name} sits innocuously on its charging dock. Its sensors gleam with an almost predatory intelligence, and you notice scorch marks around its charging contacts.
As you observe the {object_name}, its sensors suddenly swivel toward you with mechanical precision. It has detected your presence!
The {object_name} is clearly malfunctioning, sparks flying from its damaged chassis as it moves erratically. Approaching it would be extremely dangerous.

kick.message: You kick the {object_name}! It spins wildly, emits an angry beep, and its cleaning brushes start spinning at maximum speed. You've made it mad!
You kick the sparking {object_name}! Electricity arcs from its damaged circuits toward your leg!

take.message: As you try to pick up the {object_name}, its brushes suddenly spin to life, trying to escape your grasp!

unplug.message: You unplug the {object_name} from its charging dock. It powers down with a sad little beep.
You lunge for the power cord, but the {object_name} is moving! You need to time this perfectly!

redirect.message: You manage to confuse the {object_name}'s sensors by blocking its path. It stops and begins recalibrating its navigation.
You barely manage to redirect the berserk {object_name}, sending it careening toward a different target!

magnetic_field_strong.message: The strong magnetic field disrupts the {object_name}'s navigation systems!

electrical_surge.message: An electrical surge supercharges the {object_name}, sending it into overdrive!

explosion_nearby.message: The explosion damages the {object_name}'s sensors, making it move erratically!

structural_vibration.message: The vibrations confuse the {object_name}'s internal gyroscope!

docked.description: A {object_name} sits quietly on its charging dock. Its sensors gleam with an almost predatory intelligence.

patrolling.description: The {object_name} hums contentedly as it navigates the area. Its movements are methodical but seem slightly... too intelligent.

player_detected.description: The {object_name} has locked onto you! It begins moving toward you with ominous intent.

damaged_aggressive.description: Your kick has damaged the {object_name}! Now it's angry, moving aggressively with sparks flying!

water_damage_sparking.description: The {object_name} drives through water, its electronics sparking and smoking! It creates an electrified puddle wherever it goes!

damaged_wall_gas_leak.message: The sparking, water-damaged {source_hazard_object} ignites the gas from the {target_hazard_object}!

berserker_mode.description: The {object_name} has entered a terrifying berserker state! Its brushes spin at maximum speed, sparks fly constantly, and it moves with aggressive, predatory intent!

defensive_spin_qte.description: As you try to grab it, the {object_name} spins its brushes violently!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THE VACUUM IS FIGHTING BACK! Type 'hold tight' or 'let go'!
qte_context.success_message: You maintain your grip! Its brushes slow down and it powers off.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You wisely release the {object_name}, which skitters away and resumes its patrol.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The spinning brushes tear at your hands! You drop the {object_name} and it falls, damaged and sparking!

electrical_feedback_qte.description: Electricity arcs from the damaged {object_name} toward your leg!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: ELECTRICAL ARC! Type 'jump back' to avoid the shock!
qte_context.success_message: You leap backward as electricity crackles through the air where your leg was! The {object_name} shorts out completely.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The electrical feedback courses through your body! You're thrown backward, muscles spasming from the shock!

emergency_shutdown_qte.description: You lunge for the power cord of the moving {object_name}!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: GRAB THE CORD! Type 'dive and yank' to catch the moving power cord!
qte_context.success_message: You dive and successfully grab the power cord, yanking it free! The {object_name} powers down mid-movement.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You miss the cord and crash into the {object_name}! It responds aggressively to the collision!

overheating_shutdown_qte.description: The berserk {object_name} is smoking heavily! It's about to either shut down or explode!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THE VACUUM IS OVERHEATING! Type 'take cover' or 'spray water'!
qte_context.success_message: You dive behind cover just as the {object_name} explodes in a shower of sparks and plastic debris!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You spray water on the overheating {object_name}! It shorts out with a violent hiss and shuts down safely.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You're too close when the {object_name} suffers thermal failure! Hot debris peppers your body!

grab_electrocution_qte.description: You reach for the sparking {object_name}! This is extremely dangerous!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: GRABBING LIVE ELECTRONICS! Type 'use cloth' if you have one, or 'abort grab' to stop!
qte_context.success_message: Using a cloth to insulate your hands, you safely grab the {object_name} and disconnect its power! Crisis averted.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You wisely abort the grab attempt and step back as the {object_name} continues sparking dangerously.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You grab the live electronics with your bare hands! Massive electrical shock courses through your body!

ambush_attack_qte.description: The {object_name} suddenly accelerates toward you at maximum speed, brushes spinning menacingly!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: AMBUSH ATTACK! Type 'sidestep' or 'jump over' to avoid the charging vacuum!
qte_context.success_message: You sidestep at the last moment! The {object_name} crashes into the wall behind you, damaging itself!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You leap over the charging {object_name}! It passes beneath you and crashes into furniture!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The {object_name} slams into your legs! Its spinning brushes tear at your clothing and skin!

sparking_malfunction.description: The {object_name} emits showers of sparks from its damaged motor housing! It moves erratically, bumping into obstacles and spinning in tight circles.

confused_recalibrating.description: The {object_name} stops and spins in place, sensors sweeping frantically as it tries to recalibrate its navigation systems. Warning lights blink rapidly.

blast_damaged_erratic.description: The explosion has severely damaged the {object_name}'s sensors and navigation. It moves in wild, unpredictable patterns, occasionally stopping to spin aimlessly!

magnetic_attraction_malfunction.description: Strong magnetic fields disrupt the {object_name}'s navigation! It spins wildly, its metal parts drawn toward the magnetic source!

magnetic_projectile_qte.description: The magnetic field is so strong it's about to launch the {object_name} like a projectile!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THE VACUUM IS BEING MAGNETICALLY LAUNCHED! Type 'duck' to avoid it!
qte_context.success_message: You duck as the {object_name} flies overhead like a metallic missile, crashing into the wall!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The magnetically launched {object_name} strikes you with tremendous force!

misdirected_rampage.description: You've redirected the berserk {object_name} toward other targets! It tears through the room, destroying everything in its path!

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The rampaging {object_name} destroys everything!
The {object_name} crashes into structural supports!

manually_disabled.description: You successfully disabled the {object_name} by hand. It sits quietly, no longer a threat.

heroically_disabled.description: Despite the danger, you successfully disabled the sparking {object_name} using proper safety equipment. Crisis averted!

emergency_powered_down.description: Your quick thinking saved the day! The {object_name} is safely powered down.

water_cooled_shutdown.description: The water successfully cooled the overheating {object_name}, preventing an explosion. It's now safely shut down.

powered_down_safe.description: You safely unplugged the {object_name}. Sometimes the simplest solutions are the best.

shorted_out_safe.description: The {object_name} shorted itself out trying to shock you. Sometimes their aggression works against them.

magnetic_crash_destroyed.description: The magnetic force launched the {object_name} like a cannonball, destroying it completely against the wall.

exhausted_shutdown.description: After its destructive rampage, the {object_name} finally exhausts its power and shuts down amidst the chaos it created.

explosive_destruction.description: The {object_name} has exploded spectacularly! Plastic debris and electronic components are scattered across the area.

short_circuit_death.description: The {object_name} gives a final, pathetic whir before its circuits completely short out. Smoke rises from its melted plastic casing.

systems_failure_shutdown.description: The {object_name} finally succumbs to its accumulated damage. With a series of sad beeps, it powers down and stops moving.

electrocution_death.description: The electrical shock from the {object_name} stops your heart instantly. Your body convulses once and then lies still.
electrocution_death.death_message: Electrocuted while attempting to manually disable a malfunctioning robot vacuum.

electrical_retaliation.description: The electrical feedback has injured you, but the {object_name} is also damaged and moves erratically.

collision_retaliation.description: Your collision with the {object_name} has injured both of you. It responds aggressively to the impact!

successful_ambush_injury.description: The {object_name} successfully ambushed you! You're injured but it's also damaged from the high-speed impact.

thermal_explosion_injury.description: The thermal explosion peppered you with hot debris! You're burned and the {object_name} is destroyed.

magnetic_impact_injury.description: The magnetically launched {object_name} hit you hard! You're injured but it's destroyed from the impact.

crash_damaged.description: The {object_name} is badly damaged from its crash. Plastic pieces litter the ground, and it moves with a pronounced wobble.

furniture_collision_aftermath.description: The {object_name} collided with furniture during your jump! Both the vacuum and the furniture are damaged, and debris litters the area.

powered_down.description: The {object_name} is silent and dark. It seems inactive for now.

activation_sequence.description: The {object_name} ROARS to life! The air crackles with energy, and the doors to the area slam shut and lock with a heavy THUD!

projectile_stage_1.description: The magnetic field intensifies! Metallic objects in the room and adjacent areas begin to shake violently!
projectile_stage_1.player_guidance: [color=ff9900]The magnetic field is pulling in loose objects! Prepare to dodge![/color]

projectile_stage_2.description: The field grows even stronger, pulling heavier objects through the shattered observation window!
projectile_stage_2.player_guidance: [color=ff9900]More debris is coming! Stay alert or find the override![/color]

player_pinned_by_cart.description: You are injured and pinned against the machine by a heavy equipment cart!

meltdown_countdown.description: The MRI is glowing with heat. You spot an emergency console flickering with warnings. This is your only chance to stop it!
meltdown_countdown.player_guidance: [color=ff0000]FINAL CHANCE: The emergency console is active! Find the shutdown code or face certain doom![/color]

final_override_qte.description: The emergency console flickers to life! 'EMERGENCY FIELD COLLAPSE - AUTHORIZATION REQUIRED'. Someone has scratched 'SIGMA-7' into the metal nearby!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: EMERGENCY SHUTDOWN! Type 'SIGMA-7' to stop the overload!
qte_context.success_message: CODE ACCEPTED! The machine shrieks... but the overload ruptures a coolant line!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: ACCESS DENIED! The console sparks as the magnetic field reaches critical levels!

coolant_rupture.description: Success came at a cost. Freezing gas fills the room, chilling you to the bone. Above, a fire sprinkler head cracks from the extreme temperature change...

final_projectile_qte.description: CRACK! The frozen sprinkler head shatters. A jagged shard of ice-encased metal plummets toward you!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: FROZEN SHARD FALLING! Type 'dodge'!
qte_context.success_message: You dive aside as the frozen shard shatters. The MRI powers down completely. Silence falls. You've survived.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You look up a fraction too late...

catastrophic_failure.description: The {object_name} shakes violently, overloading! Meltdown imminent!
catastrophic_failure.death_message: killed in the MRI overload after failing the emergency shutdown sequence.

exploded.description: The {object_name} is a smoking, twisted wreck.

safely_powered_down.description: The {object_name} is silent and dark. The magnetic field has dissipated.

ironic_death_ending.description: The frozen shard of metal impales you, a final, cold irony.
ironic_death_ending.death_message: Killed by a frozen sprinkler head shard.

examine.message: You examine the {object_name} closely. The water seems to be spreading slowly, and you notice it's slightly oily, making it even more slippery than normal water.
As you lean over the {object_name}, you notice it has an unusual color and smell. This isn't just water - something else has contaminated it.
The {object_name} crackles and sparks dangerously! Getting close would be suicide - you can see the electrical current dancing across the water's surface.
The {object_name} gives off noxious fumes that make your eyes water. Whatever has contaminated this water is clearly hazardous.

step_in.message: You step into the {object_name} and immediately feel your foot sliding! You need to regain your balance quickly!
You step into the larger {object_name} and your foot shoots out from under you! You're falling!
The moment you step into the {object_name}, both feet go out from under you! You're falling hard!
Your foot touches the electrified {object_name}! Electricity courses through your body!
You step into the contaminated {object_name}! The toxic substance immediately begins eating through your shoe!

cross.message: You attempt to cross the {object_name} carefully, but it's wider and more slippery than you anticipated!

avoid.message: You carefully navigate around the {object_name}, taking your time to avoid the slippery surface.

splash.message: You deliberately splash in the {object_name}! Water flies everywhere, but this reckless action has consequences...

absorb.message: You use the cloth to absorb the {object_name}. Most of the water is soaked up, making the area much safer.
You absorb the toxic {object_name} with the cloth, but now the cloth itself is contaminated and dangerous!

mop.message: You methodically mop up the {object_name}, leaving the floor clean and dry.

electrical_spark_nearby.message: Electrical sparks near the {object_name} create a dangerous situation!

faulty_wiring_contact.message: Live wires touch the {object_name}, instantly electrifying it!

fire_heat_nearby.message: Heat from the fire causes the {object_name} to evaporate rapidly!

gas_leak_mixing.message: Gas mixes with the {object_name}, creating a volatile combination!

chemical_spill_contact.message: Chemical contamination turns the {object_name} into a toxic hazard!

structural_vibration.message: Vibrations cause the {object_name} to slosh unpredictably!

gas_leak.message: Gas from the {target_hazard_object} dissolves into the {source_hazard_object}, creating a flammable mixture!

contaminated_waste.message: Toxic waste from the {target_hazard_object} contaminates the {source_hazard_object}!

robo_vacuum.message: The {target_hazard_object} drives through the {source_hazard_object}, creating a dangerous electrical hazard!

small.description: There's a small {object_name} around the {support_object}. The water reflects the light with an oily sheen that suggests it might be more slippery than normal water.

growing.description: The {object_name} has grown larger around the {support_object}, spreading outward in an irregular pattern. You can see your reflection in the still water, and it looks dangerously slick.

slip_hazard.description: There's a large, dangerous {object_name} spreading from the {support_object}. The surface tension makes it look deceptively shallow, but it's treacherous to walk on.
slip_hazard.slip_message: You slip on the wet floor and fall painfully!

escalation_logic.message: Your movement near the {object_name} destabilizes your footing!

treacherous_surface.description: The {object_name} has become a treacherous, mirror-like surface that's impossible to navigate safely. Even looking at it makes you feel unsteady.

minor_slip_qte.description: You feel your foot starting to slide in the {object_name}! You need to regain your balance quickly!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: LOSING BALANCE! Type 'steady yourself' or 'windmill arms'!
qte_context.success_message: You plant your other foot firmly and steady yourself, regaining your balance before falling!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You windmill your arms frantically and manage to regain your balance, though you look ridiculous doing it!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't regain your balance! You fall backward, hitting the ground hard!

balance_recovery_qte.description: Your foot shoots out from under you in the {object_name}! You're falling fast!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: FALLING! Type 'grab something' or 'roll with it'!
qte_context.success_message: You grab onto a nearby surface and pull yourself back to stability! That was close!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You go with the fall and roll, absorbing the impact and coming up mostly unharmed!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You fall hard on your back! The impact knocks the wind out of you!

catastrophic_slip_qte.description: Both feet go out from under you on the treacherous {object_name}! You're falling hard and fast!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: CATASTROPHIC FALL! Type 'protect head' or 'spread impact'!
qte_context.success_message: You tuck your head and protect it with your arms as you fall! You hit hard but avoid serious head injury!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You spread your arms and legs to distribute the impact! You hit the ground hard but it could have been worse!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You fall completely uncontrolled! Your head strikes the ground with a sickening crack!

crossing_slip_qte.description: Halfway across the {object_name}, your careful steps betray you! You start to slide uncontrollably!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: SLIDING ACROSS WATER! Type 'surf it out' or 'drop and crawl'!
qte_context.success_message: You lean into the slide and ride it out like surfing! You reach the other side in an unorthodox but successful manner!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You drop to your hands and knees and crawl across the remaining distance! Undignified but effective!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You lose control completely and slide wildly across the {object_name} before crashing into the opposite wall!

electrocution_qte.description: Electricity courses through your body from the electrified {object_name}! You need to break the connection immediately!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: ELECTROCUTION! Type 'yank foot back' to break contact!
qte_context.success_message: You force your muscles to respond and yank your foot back! The electrical contact is broken!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The electrical current paralyzes your muscles! You can't pull away as the voltage increases!

contamination_exposure_qte.description: The toxic substance in the {object_name} is eating through your shoe and burning your skin! You need immediate action!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: TOXIC EXPOSURE! Type 'rinse with water' or 'remove shoe'!
qte_context.success_message: You quickly rinse your foot with clean water, diluting the toxic substance before it can cause serious harm!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You quickly remove your shoe and sock, preventing the toxic substance from reaching your skin!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The toxic substance continues to burn through your shoe and into your foot! The pain is excruciating!

splash_consequences_qte.description: Your splashing has sent water flying everywhere! Some of it hits a sparking electrical outlet!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: WATER HIT ELECTRICITY! Type 'jump back' to avoid the arc!
qte_context.success_message: You leap backward as electrical arcs dance where you were standing! Your quick reflexes saved you!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You're too close when the electrical arc reaches the water you're standing in!

automatic_slip_qte.description: Your proximity to the {object_name} causes you to inadvertently step too close! Your foot hits the edge and you start to slip!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: INVOLUNTARY SLIP! Type 'catch balance' quickly!
qte_context.success_message: You quickly shift your weight and catch your balance before falling!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't react fast enough! You slip and fall into the {object_name}!

electrified.description: The {object_name} crackles and sparks with deadly electrical current! Arcs of electricity dance across the water's surface like deadly lightning!
electrified.death_message: You make contact with the electrified water. The electrical shock stops your heart instantly.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The electrical overload spreads to nearby wiring!

electrical_fire_ignition.description: The electrical current in the {object_name} has ignited! Blue-white flames dance across the water's surface, creating an impossible and terrifying sight!
electrical_fire_ignition.death_message: The electrical fire spreads faster than you can escape. You're consumed by impossible flames.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The electrical fire spreads to everything flammable!

flammable_mixture.description: The {object_name} has mixed with gas, creating a dangerous, volatile surface! The slightest spark could ignite it!
flammable_mixture.death_message: The flammable mixture ignites explosively, consuming you in a fireball!

spontaneous_ignition_risk.description: The volatile mixture in the {object_name} is reaching auto-ignition temperature! You can see vapors rising from the surface!

ignition_explosion_qte.description: The volatile mixture is about to ignite spontaneously! You can see flames starting to appear at the edges!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: EXPLOSION IMMINENT! Type 'run' to escape!
qte_context.success_message: You sprint away as the {object_name} explodes in a brilliant fireball behind you!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't escape the explosion radius! The blast engulfs you!

toxic_spill.description: The {object_name} has been contaminated with toxic chemicals! Noxious fumes rise from the surface, and you can see it's slowly eating away at the floor beneath it!

corrosive_expansion.description: The toxic {object_name} is eating through the floor! The contaminated area is expanding as the chemicals dissolve everything they touch!

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The corrosive puddle weakens the floor structure!

floor_breach_qte.description: The corrosive {object_name} has eaten completely through the floor! The surface is collapsing!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: FLOOR COLLAPSING! Type 'jump to safety' or 'grab edge'!
qte_context.success_message: You leap to solid ground as the corroded floor collapses into the space below!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You grab the edge of stable flooring and pull yourself to safety as the toxic area falls away!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You fall through the corroded floor into the toxic pit below!

ice_formation.description: The {object_name} is freezing over! A thin layer of ice covers the surface, making it even more treacherous than before!

solid_ice_sheet.description: The {object_name} has become a solid sheet of ice! It's like a skating rink in the middle of the room!

ice_skating_qte.description: You're sliding uncontrollably across the ice sheet! You're picking up speed and heading toward a wall!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: UNCONTROLLED SLIDE! Type 'spread arms' or 'try to turn'!
qte_context.success_message: You spread your arms to slow down and manage to come to a stop before hitting the wall!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You lean into a turn and manage to redirect your slide, gliding to safety!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You slam into the wall at full speed! The impact is devastating!

steam_evaporation.description: Heat from a nearby fire is rapidly evaporating the {object_name}! Steam billows up, obscuring your vision and creating new dangers!

steam_cloud_hazard.description: The room is filled with scalding steam! You can barely see anything, and the hot vapor burns your lungs!

slip_injury_recovery.description: You're on the ground after slipping in the {object_name}, but you're conscious and can get up.

winded_recovery_qte.description: You're winded and struggling to breathe after your fall! You need to recover quickly!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: WINDED! Type 'slow breathing' to recover!
qte_context.success_message: You control your breathing and slowly recover your wind. You can move again.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You panic and hyperventilate! You remain winded and vulnerable!

head_injury_qte.description: Your head is spinning from the impact! You're seeing double and struggling to stay conscious!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: STAY CONSCIOUS! Type 'fight it' to remain awake!
qte_context.success_message: You fight through the dizziness and manage to stay conscious. You have a severe headache but you're functional.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The concussion overwhelms you. You lose consciousness on the wet floor.
