unconscious_drowning_risk.description: You're unconscious face-down in the {object_name}! Even this shallow water could be fatal!
unconscious_drowning_risk.death_message: You drowned in just a few inches of water while unconscious.

electrical_shock_recovery.description: You've broken contact with the electrical source, but your muscles are twitching from the shock. You need medical attention.

successful_avoidance.description: You successfully navigate around the {object_name} without incident. Your caution paid off.

successful_crossing.description: Despite the slip, you managed to cross the {object_name} successfully! Your unconventional surfing technique worked perfectly.

cautious_crossing_success.description: Your hands-and-knees approach was undignified but effective. You're across safely.

ice_skating_success.description: You turned a dangerous ice slide into a graceful glide! You've successfully navigated the frozen hazard.

absorbed_cleanup.description: You've successfully absorbed most of the water with your cloth. The area is now much safer to navigate.

mopped_clean.description: You've thoroughly mopped up the {object_name}. The floor is now clean and dry.

evaporated_safe.description: The steam has cleared and the water has completely evaporated. The danger has passed naturally.

electrocution_death.description: The electrical current stops your heart. Your body convulses once and then lies still in the deadly water.
electrocution_death.death_message: Electrocuted by stepping in an electrified water puddle.

explosion_death.description: The explosive ignition of the volatile mixture consumes you in an instant fireball.
explosion_death.death_message: Killed in the explosion of a flammable water/gas mixture.

toxic_pit_death.description: You fall into the corrosive pit below. The toxic chemicals dissolve you completely.
toxic_pit_death.death_message: Fell through a floor corroded by toxic chemicals and dissolved in the pit below.

drowning_death.description: Unconscious and face-down, you drown in just a few inches of water. A tragic end to a simple slip.
drowning_death.death_message: Drowned in a shallow puddle while unconscious from a head injury.

contaminated_cloth_hazard.description: The cloth you used is now saturated with toxic chemicals and has become a hazard itself!

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The contaminated cloth creates a new toxic hazard!

explosion_aftermath.description: The area where the {object_name} was is now a scorched blast zone. The explosion has damaged nearby structures.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The explosion has compromised structural integrity!

floor_hole_hazard.description: Where the {object_name} was, there's now a gaping hole in the floor. The edges are unstable and toxic fumes rise from below.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The hole edges are structurally unsound!

sloshing_danger.description: The {object_name} sloshes unpredictably due to structural vibrations, making it impossible to safely navigate.

electrification_warning.description: Electrical sparks are getting dangerously close to the {object_name}! The combination could be lethal!

loose_object.name: Loose Object
loose_object.death_message: The falling {object_name} strikes you with deadly force!

examine.message: As you examine the {object_name}, it shifts alarmingly.

take.message: You try to grab the {object_name}, but it slips from your grasp and begins to fall!

escalation_logic.message: A slight tremor passes through the room, and the {object_name} on the {support_object} shifts slightly.

falling.description: The {object_name} suddenly topples from the {support_object} and plummets!

fallen.description: The {object_name} lies shattered or dented on the floor near the {support_object}.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.trigger_message: The crash of the {source_name} makes you jump!
When the {source_name} hit the floor, its contents spilled out!

malfunctioning_ventilator.name: Malfunctioning Ventilator
malfunctioning_ventilator.description: A critical piece of medical equipment, the ventilator is currently malfunctioning, endangering the life of a patient in the ICU bay.

examine.message: The patient's skin is pallid, almost translucent, under the harsh ICU lights. His chest rises and falls in a rhythm not his own, dictated by the machine beside him. A metal dog tag rests on his collarbone: 'WAINWRIGHT, CORBIN - O NEG'.
A worrying blue tinge creeps into Corbin's lips. His chest barely moves, and the effortless rhythm from moments ago has been replaced by a shallow, labored struggle.
Corbin's eyes shoot open, wide with a primal terror that transcends words. He can't speak, he can't scream, but his gaze locks with yours, a desperate, silent plea for air that isn't coming.
The ventilator hums with deceptive tranquility. A faint, almost imperceptible tremor runs through its casing. A single drop of condensation traces a path down its side like a tear.
The rhythmic hiss becomes a stuttering cough. *Hiss... pause... HISS-hiss...* An amber light blinks with maddening insistence on the control panel. It smells of hot plastic.
Gibberish error codes flash faster than you can read them. The piercing alarm stops, replaced by an ominous prompt: 'MANUAL OVERRIDE REQUIRED...'
The console screen glows with a stark message: 'EMERGENCY OVERRIDE - AUTHORIZATION CODE: RX-88-OMEGA'. The letters seem to pulse with the patient's weakening heartbeat.
The monitor is a sea of calming green lines. Heart rate: 72 BPM. O2 saturation: 98%. The numbers paint a picture of stability that feels unnervingly temporary.
The calm green lines now show jagged peaks. O2 saturation has plummeted to 85%. A new, flashing 'LOW OXYGEN' warning appears.
CRITICAL ALERT! The monitor is a frantic display of red. O2 saturation: 72% and dropping. Heart rate: 115 BPM and erratic.

use.message: You open a maintenance panel on the ventilator, revealing a mess of wiring and tubing. You can see what might be the problem - a loose connection. This is risky, but it might work.
With alarms blaring, you desperately attempt an emergency repair on the ventilator. This is extremely dangerous with the machine in this state!

push.message: You give the ventilator a hard shove in frustration. It stops its erratic behavior for a second, then emits a loud ZAP as a power surge courses through it!

stable_rhythm.description: The rhythmic hiss of the ventilator is the only sound, a fragile barrier against the room's oppressive silence. Above the patient, a ceiling light fixture gives a single, almost imperceptible flicker, a subtle flaw in the sterile perfection.

erratic_hiss.description: The ventilator's rhythm stutters, its mechanical breaths now out of sync with life. *Hiss... pause... HISS-hiss...* On the monitor, Corbin's O2 saturation drops to 85%.

critical_alarm.description: A shrill, piercing alarm slices through the silence. BEEP! BEEP! BEEP! The ventilator convulses, its struggle now violent. Corbin's lips are a deep, terrifying blue. O2 sat: 72%!

repair_attempt_qte.description: You have opened the ventilator's maintenance panel. A loose connection sparks intermittently. You need to reconnect it at precisely the right moment between electrical pulses!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: WAIT FOR THE ELECTRICAL PULSE TO STOP... NOW! Press SPACE at the exact right moment!
qte_context.success_message: Perfect timing! You reconnect the tube between electrical pulses. The machine's rhythm stabilizes with a relieved sigh.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You mistimed it! The electrical pulse surges through your hand as you touch the connection!

emergency_repair_qte.description: Alarms blare as you work frantically on multiple failing systems! You need to perform several emergency procedures simultaneously!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: MULTIPLE SYSTEM FAILURE! Type the commands quickly: 'bypass', 'reconnect', 'stabilize'!
qte_context.success_message: Your rapid emergency repairs work! Multiple systems stabilize, but the strain creates dangerous electrical feedback!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't keep up with the cascading failures! Systems crash one by one!

manual_reset_qte.description: The console flashes: 'EMERGENCY OVERRIDE - AUTHORIZATION CODE: RX-88-OMEGA'. The screen flickers violently, threatening to fail! You must input the code before the display dies completely!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: DISPLAY FAILING! Mash SPACE to keep screen stable, then type: 'rx-88-omega'!
qte_context.success_message: You stabilize the display and enter the code! The machine responds but triggers a massive power feedback loop!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The display dies before you can complete the sequence! Emergency systems engage automatically with catastrophic results!

electrical_surge_qte.description: The live wire falls in a deadly arc! You must guide it away from the patient's bed with precise movements!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: GUIDE THE WIRE AWAY! Use arrow keys: LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT to redirect its path!
qte_context.success_message: You expertly guide the sparking wire away from the bed! It clatters harmlessly to the floor!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You slam your body against the bed, shoving it clear! The wire strikes the floor with a brilliant flash!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't control the wire's deadly path! It strikes the metal bed frame with devastating results!

final_self_extubation_qte.description: Corbin's hand shoots toward the breathing tube! You must restrain him with just enough force - too little and he'll pull it out, too much and you'll hurt him!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: HOLD SPACE to restrain him gently! Release when the struggle meter reaches the green zone!
qte_context.success_message: You restrain him with perfect gentleness! He calms as you take the book from his trembling hand. You've truly saved him.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You either hold too tightly or not firmly enough! He breaks free and grabs the tube!

mercy_choice_qte.description: The ventilator is dead. Corbin is suffocating, his eyes pleading. The wire dangles overhead like a sword of Damocles. You have an impossible choice.

qte_context.ui_prompt_message:
Choose his fate:
1 - Remove the tube (mercy)
2 - Wait for the wire to fall (fate)
3 - Try to revive the machine (desperation)

1.message: With heavy heart, you grant him mercy. His eyes show profound gratitude as peace takes him.

2.message: You step back, letting fate decide. His gaze never leaves yours as he fades naturally.

3.message: In desperation, you frantically try to restart the machine, but it's too late. The wire falls.

cascade_failure_qte.description: Multiple systems are failing in sequence! You must restart each one in the correct rhythm to prevent total collapse!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: MATCH THE HEARTBEAT RHYTHM! Press SPACE to the beat: _ _ _BEAT_ _ _BEAT_ _ _BEAT_
qte_context.success_message: You synchronize the systems to Corbin's failing heartbeat! Everything stabilizes in harmony!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't match the rhythm! The systems fall completely out of sync!

shocked_repair_failure.description: The electrical shock has damaged your nervous system! Your hands shake uncontrollably as you try to complete the repair!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: FIGHT THE SHAKING! Hold SPACE steady despite the tremors! Don't let go!
qte_context.success_message: Through pure willpower, you overcome the electrical damage and complete the repair!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The shaking overwhelms you! Your hands slip at the crucial moment!

temporarily_stable.description: Your repair seems to be holding. The ventilator functions normally, its rhythm steady and reassuring. Corbin's color improves slightly.

electrical_surge_warning.description: The power surge brings the frayed electrical cable to life! It spits and crackles, drawn by the conductive metal bed frame below.

rhythmic_stabilization_success.description: By synchronizing with Corbin's heartbeat, you've created perfect harmony between man and machine. A medical miracle.

heroic_repair_success.description: Despite electrical shock damage, you completed the repair through sheer determination. Corbin is stable.

total_system_failure.description: All systems have failed in cascade. The medical equipment dies with a final, pathetic wheeze.

patient_saved_reward.description: Corbin is safe, his breathing steady, thanks to your intervention. He presses the leather-bound book into your hands with a final, knowing nod before closing his eyes to rest. You've done the impossible.

patient_death_merciful.description: Corbin Wainright is gone. His suffering was ended by a human hand, a small act of defiance against a cruel design.

patient_death_natural.description: You stepped aside and let fate run its course. Corbin's death was inevitable, but free of gruesome spectacle.

patient_death_gruesome_electrocution.description: ZAP! The live wire makes contact. Corbin's body convulses violently as electricity courses through him. Death got its spectacle.

patient_death_ironic_self_extubation.description: Corbin rips the tube from his own throat in panic. Death always finds a way, even through the patient's own desperate actions.

active_bone_saw.name: Active Bone Saw
active_bone_saw.description: A powered surgical bone saw, now out of control. Its blade spins menacingly as it skitters across the floor, posing a severe hazard to anyone nearby.

examine.message: The bone saw's handle is slick and vibrating. It looks like it could slip from your grasp at any moment.
The bone saw skitters across the floor, its blade spinning and sending sparks as it bounces off the tiles.

use.message: You use your tool to pin down the bone saw and power it off. It's now safe to pick up.

take.message: You reach for the bone saw, but its handle is slick! You must grip it tightly before it slips away.

inactive.description: The bone saw lies on the operating table, its motor silent. It looks like it could be useful, but also dangerous.

slipping_qte.description: As you grab the Bone Saw, its handle feels slick with some unseen residue. It twists in your hand!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: The bone saw slips in your hand, its jagged teeth rushing toward your leg! GRIP it tight!
qte_context.success_message: You get a firm grip and the saw powers down. You've secured it.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You fail to get a good grip!
qte_context.timeout_message: You fumble with the slippery handle!

button_mash_wrestle.description: The saw vibrates violently! You must wrestle it down before it escapes!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: MASH the button to overpower the saw!
qte_context.success_message: You overpower the saw and pin it to the table!
qte_context.failure_message: The saw slips free and skitters across the floor!

hold_and_release_pin.description: You have the saw pinned, but you must hold it steady and release at the right moment to power it off safely!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: HOLD SPACE to pin the saw, RELEASE when the indicator turns green!
qte_context.success_message: You release at the perfect moment and power down the saw!
qte_context.failure_message: You release too early or too late! The saw escapes your grip!

skittering_on_floor.name: skittering_on_floor
skittering_on_floor.description: The saw clatters to the floor, and with a horrifying BUZZ, its motor roars to life! The saw skitters across the floor, its blade spinning wildly!

states.on_reach_message: The saw's spinning blade slams into the wall, tearing into a hidden gas line!
The active saw slides into a puddle, shorting out with a violent spray of sparks that ignites nearby material!
With no other obvious target, the saw turns and lunges towards your feet!

dodge_saw_directional.name: dodge saw directional
dodge_saw_directional.description: The bone saw lunges at your feet, zig-zagging unpredictably! You must input the correct sequence to dodge!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: The saw zig-zags! Input the sequence: LEFT, RIGHT, UP!
qte_context.success_message: You dodge the erratic saw with perfect timing!
qte_context.failure_message: You stumble and the saw slices into your leg!
qte_context.timeout_message: You hesitate and the saw catches you!

safely_in_inventory.description: For some reason, you add the menacing weapon to your inventory.

destroyed.description: The bone saw smashes into its target and its motor dies with a final, pathetic whine.

examine.message: The {object} groans under its own weight as you look at it.

wobbling.description: The {object} looks overloaded and precarious, wobbling slightly.

collapsing.description: With a terrible groan, the {object} gives way!
collapsing.death_message: The {object} gives way! Heavy items and splintered wood crash down, burying you.

collapsed.description: The {object} lies in a heap of broken wood and scattered contents on the floor.

examine.message: You examine the {object_name} closely. The {support_object} shows stress fractures, and you can see that the weight distribution is dangerously uneven. A few items have already shifted ominously.
As you lean in to examine the {object_name}, your proximity causes it to shift slightly. A book falls from the top shelf, and the entire structure groans alarmingly!
The {object_name} is swaying so violently that examining it closely would be suicidal. Even from a distance, you can see items shifting and falling.

touch.message: You gingerly touch the {object_name}. It shifts slightly, causing several items to rattle. The movement is subtle but alarming.
The moment you touch the {object_name}, it begins to tip! You've triggered its collapse!
Your touch is the final straw! The {object_name} immediately begins its catastrophic fall!

push.message: You push against the {object_name} to test its stability. This was a mistake - it immediately begins toppling with tremendous force!
Your push triggers a catastrophic chain reaction! The {object_name} doesn't just fall - it crashes into other furniture, starting a domino effect!

stabilize.message: Using your tools, you manage to brace the {object_name} against the wall. It's more stable now, but this is clearly a temporary solution.
You secure the {object_name} with rope, tying it to nearby fixed points. The improvised rigging should hold for a while.

search.message: You start searching through the {object_name}, but shifting its contents disturbs the delicate balance!

climb.message: You attempt to climb the {object_name} to reach something high up. The additional weight immediately causes it to begin falling!

structural_vibration.message: Vibrations cause the {object_name} to sway dangerously!

explosion_nearby.message: The explosion's shockwave violently displaces the {object_name}!

flood_water_contact.message: Water weakens the base of the {object_name}!

electrical_surge.message: Electrical interference affects the {object_name}'s magnetic latches!

temperature_extreme.message: Temperature changes cause the {object_name} to expand and shift!

fire_heat_nearby.message: Intense heat warps the structure supporting the {object_name}!

weak_floorboards.message: The unstable {source_hazard_object} crashes down onto the already-weakened {target_hazard_object}!

robo_vacuum.message: The {target_hazard_object} collides with the base of the {source_hazard_object}, destabilizing it!

gas_leak.message: The falling {source_hazard_object} strikes the {target_hazard_object}, causing a violent rupture!

unstable.description: The {object_name} near the {support_object} looks unsteady, as if it might fall. You can see that its weight is poorly distributed, and small vibrations cause visible movement.

very_unstable.description: The {object_name} on the {support_object} wobbles precariously at the slightest movement. Items on its shelves shift visibly, and you can hear the structure creaking under stress.

critical_balance.description: The {object_name} is barely maintaining its balance! It sways ominously, and small objects are already falling from its upper levels. The slightest disturbance could trigger a complete collapse.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: Items begin falling from the {source_name}!

imminent_collapse_qte.description: The {object_name} is starting to fall! You have seconds to react!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THE {object_name} IS FALLING! Type 'dodge left', 'dodge right', or 'dive back'!
qte_context.success_message: You dodge to the left as the {object_name} crashes down! Books and debris scatter where you were standing moments before.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You leap to the right just as the {object_name} topples! Its contents explode across the floor in a shower of objects.
qte_context.tertiary_success_message: You dive backward as the {object_name} slams forward! You're showered with debris but avoid the worst of it.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate too long! The {object_name} crashes down on top of you!

destabilizing_touch_qte.description: Your touch has destabilized the {object_name}! It's tipping toward you!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: IT'S TIPPING TOWARD YOU! Type 'push back' or 'jump away'!
qte_context.success_message: You quickly push against the {object_name}, guiding its fall away from you! It crashes harmlessly to the side.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You leap away as the {object_name} topples! It crashes where you were standing, missing you by inches.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't get out of the way in time! The {object_name} falls directly onto you!

violent_topple_qte.description: Your push sends the {object_name} into a violent topple! It's falling with tremendous force!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: VIOLENT COLLAPSE! Type 'shield yourself' or 'run away'!
qte_context.success_message: You throw your arms up to shield yourself as the {object_name} explodes into pieces around you! You're battered but protected from the worst debris.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You sprint away as the {object_name} crashes down with devastating force! The ground shakes under your feet from the impact.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The violent collapse catches you completely off guard! Heavy debris rains down on you!

catastrophic_domino_qte.description: Your push triggers a domino effect! The {object_name} is crashing into other furniture, causing a chain reaction of destruction!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: DOMINO EFFECT! Type 'find safe spot' or 'ride it out'!
qte_context.success_message: You identify a safe corner and dive for it as furniture crashes all around you! The chain reaction is devastating but you're protected.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You brace yourself in place and weather the storm of falling objects! It's chaotic but you manage to stay upright through the destruction.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The chain reaction overwhelms you! Furniture crashes down from multiple directions!

search_destabilization_qte.description: Your searching has shifted the contents enough to destabilize the {object_name}! Objects are starting to slide!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: CONTENTS SHIFTING! Type 'redistribute weight' or 'grab and run'!
qte_context.success_message: You carefully redistribute the shifting objects, restoring the {object_name}'s balance. Your methodical approach prevents disaster.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You grab what you can and sprint away as the {object_name} collapses behind you! You got what you needed just in time.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't rebalance the contents in time! The shifting weight causes a complete collapse!

climbing_collapse_qte.description: Your weight on the {object_name} is causing it to tip over backward! You're going down with it!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: YOU'RE FALLING WITH IT! Type 'leap off' or 'ride it down'!
qte_context.success_message: You push off from the falling {object_name} and leap to safety! It crashes behind you as you land hard but safely.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You decide to ride the {object_name} down, using it to cushion your fall! It's a wild ride but you survive the controlled crash.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You're trapped on the falling {object_name}! It crashes down with you underneath!

seismic_instability.description: Vibrations have made the {object_name} extremely unstable! It sways back and forth continuously, items constantly falling from its shelves!

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: Objects rain down from the violently swaying {source_name}!

blast_displacement.description: The explosion has physically displaced the {object_name}! It's been thrown off its base and is sliding across the floor!

water_damaged_base.description: Water has weakened the base of the {object_name}! The supporting structure is beginning to rot and buckle under the weight!

resonance_collapse_qte.description: The vibrations have reached resonance frequency! The {object_name} is shaking itself apart!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: RESONANCE COLLAPSE! Type 'dampen vibrations' or 'evacuate area'!
qte_context.success_message: You wedge objects against the base to dampen the vibrations! The {object_name} stabilizes just before complete failure.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You evacuate as the {object_name} shakes itself to pieces! You escape the debris field just in time.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The resonance collapse is too violent to control! The {object_name} disintegrates!

sliding_collision_qte.description: The displaced {object_name} is sliding across the floor toward you! It's massive and picking up speed!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: SLIDING TOWARD YOU! Type 'stop it' or 'get out of way'!
qte_context.success_message: You brace yourself and manage to stop the sliding {object_name}! Your feet dig into the floor as you absorb its momentum.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You dive aside as the {object_name} slides past you and crashes into the wall! Debris explodes everywhere.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The sliding {object_name} slams into you with tremendous force!

temporarily_braced.description: You've temporarily braced the {object_name} with tools, but the fix is clearly makeshift. The structure still creaks ominously under stress.

brace_failure.description: Your makeshift bracing is beginning to fail! The {object_name} is starting to shift again as your temporary supports give way!

roped_secured.description: The rope rigging is holding the {object_name} in place, but you can see the rope stretching under the load. This solution won't last forever.

fallen_safe_distance.description: The {object_name} lies in ruins, but your quick dodge kept you at a safe distance. Debris is scattered everywhere but you're unharmed.

controlled_fall_success.description: You successfully guided the fall of the {object_name} away from yourself. It's destroyed, but in a controlled manner that minimized damage.

rebalanced_success.description: Through careful redistribution of weight, you've actually made the {object_name} more stable than it was before. Your methodical approach paid off.

domino_survivor.description: You survived the catastrophic chain reaction by finding the one safe spot in the chaos. Furniture lies destroyed all around you, but you're untouched.

crushing_injury_state.description: The {object_name} has fallen on you! You're trapped and injured beneath its weight.

extraction_attempt_qte.description: You're pinned under the debris! You need to free yourself before the situation gets worse!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: PINNED UNDER DEBRIS! Type 'push off' or 'wiggle free'!
qte_context.success_message: With tremendous effort, you push off the heaviest piece and crawl out from under the wreckage! You're hurt but free.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You carefully wiggle free from the debris, avoiding further injury as you extract yourself from the wreckage.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't free yourself! The debris shifts, pinning you even more tightly!

fallen.description: The {object_name}, which had fallen from the {support_object}, now lies shattered or dented on the floor. Its contents are scattered everywhere, creating new hazards.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.trigger_message: The crash of the {source_name} scatters dangerous debris everywhere!
When the {source_name} hit the floor, its contents spilled out!
Broken glass and sharp fragments create a dangerous debris field!

domino_effect_death.description: The chain reaction of falling furniture overwhelms you. Multiple heavy objects crash down simultaneously, and there's no escape from the avalanche of destruction.
domino_effect_death.death_message: Crushed in a catastrophic domino effect of falling furniture.

damaged_wall_gas_leak.name: Damaged Wall Gas Leak
object_name_options: a ruptured gas line in the wall
a cracked section of the wall hissing faintly
a damaged gas meter leaking steadily

examine.message: As you lean in to examine the {object_name}, the leak suddenly worsens with a violent hiss! Your proximity has disturbed something critical.
Your movement near the {object_name} disturbs the gas-laden air. The concentration has reached critical levels - any spark could be catastrophic!
The violent gas spray has been eating away at the wall itself! As you examine it closer, you hear an ominous crack from the supporting structure.

use.message: You light the lighter near the {object_name}! The gas ignites with a brilliant flash that races along the vapor trail!
You blast the fire extinguisher at the leak! The pressurized chemicals create an unexpected reaction with the gas...
You manage to tighten the fitting on the {object_name}, reducing the leak temporarily.
use.failure_message: The fitting is too corroded! Your wrench slips and gouges the metal, making things worse!

use.message: The gas pressure is too high! Your wrench creates a spark against the metal and the {object_name} ruptures further!
You hastily wrap duct tape around the {object_name}, creating a makeshift seal that bulges ominously.
You jam the crowbar into the wall near the {object_name}! Metal scrapes against metal, creating sparks as you accidentally puncture the main gas line!

activate_ventilation.message: You activate nearby ventilation. The gas begins to disperse, but the sudden air movement makes the leak whistle ominously.

kick.message: In frustration, you kick the wall near the {object_name}! The impact dislodges something inside the wall and the hissing becomes a roar!

faulty_wiring.message: The sparks from the {target_hazard_object} arc towards the flammable gas from the {source_hazard_object}!

hissing_leak.description: A faint hiss emanates from {object_name}, and the distinctive smell of mercaptan - that rotten egg odor added to natural gas - is noticeable.

heavy_leak.description: The smell of gas from the {object_name} is now very strong, making your eyes water and causing a metallic taste in your mouth. The air feels thick and volatile.

pressurized_rupture.description: The {object_name} now sprays gas forcefully! The acrid smell burns your nostrils and the hissing is much louder. You can actually see the gas distorting the air like heat waves.

critical_accumulation.description: Dangerous levels of gas have accumulated! The air shimmers with volatile vapors near the {object_name}. Static electricity makes your hair stand on end. Any spark could be catastrophic!
critical_accumulation.death_message: The gas ignites explosively around the {object_name}, consuming you in flames!

ignition_cascade_qte.description: A spark ignites the gas around the {object_name}! Flames race along the gas trail like a burning fuse!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: GAS EXPLOSION IMMINENT! Type 'run' to escape or 'shield' to protect yourself!
qte_context.success_message: You bolt from the room just as the {object_name} explodes in a brilliant fireball behind you!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You dive behind cover and shield your face as the explosion tears through the room! You're singed but alive.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate! The explosion catches you as you try to flee!
qte_context.timeout_message: Too slow! The gas explosion engulfs you before you can escape!

survived_with_injuries_qte.description: You're burned and disoriented, but alive. However, secondary gas lines are now rupturing from the explosion damage! You need to stop the gas flow before another explosion!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: SECONDARY RUPTURES! Type 'shutoff valve' or 'evacuate now'!
qte_context.success_message: Through the smoke and flames, you locate the main gas valve and turn it off! The hissing stops and you've prevented a larger catastrophe.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You sprint for the exit as more gas lines rupture! You make it out just as the secondary explosion rocks the building behind you.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You fumble in the smoke, unable to find the right action! More gas pours out!
qte_context.timeout_message: The smoke overwhelms you as more gas ignites. The secondary explosion is massive.

explosion_recovery_qte.description: Burned and struggling to breathe, you see the gas leak has ruptured the wall itself! Structural debris is falling as more gas escapes!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: STRUCTURAL COLLAPSE! Type 'crawl out' to escape low, or 'climb debris' to go over!
qte_context.success_message: You crawl beneath the falling debris, staying below the gas layer! You escape as the room collapses behind you.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You scramble over the debris pile just as it settles! A risky move, but you're out.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't decide on an escape route! The debris pins you down!
qte_context.timeout_message: The collapse traps you as gas continues to pour in. There's no escape.

chemical_reaction_qte.description: The fire extinguisher chemicals are reacting with the gas! A toxic cloud is forming while pressure builds dangerously!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: TOXIC REACTION! Type 'hold breath' or 'ventilate area'!
qte_context.success_message: You hold your breath and sprint out! The toxic mixture would have killed you in seconds.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You smash a window to ventilate the area! The toxic gases disperse, but the pressure buildup continues...
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You breathe in the toxic mixture! Your lungs burn as you collapse!
qte_context.timeout_message: The chemical reaction overwhelms you. Your last breath is poison.

pressure_buildup_qte.description: You've ventilated the toxic gases, but now pressure is building to explosive levels behind the blocked leak!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: PRESSURE CRITICAL! Type 'release valve' or 'take cover'!
qte_context.success_message: You find the pressure release valve and vent the gas safely! Crisis averted through quick thinking.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You dive for cover as the pressure finally releases explosively! You're thrown but survive.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't find the right action! The pressure reaches critical mass!
qte_context.timeout_message: The pressure buildup reaches its limit. The explosion is inevitable.

spontaneous_ignition_qte.description: The gas concentration has reached auto-ignition temperature! A small flame appears from nowhere - possibly static electricity!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: SPONTANEOUS IGNITION! Type 'dive' immediately!
qte_context.success_message: You dive through the doorway as the room erupts behind you! Spontaneous ignition nearly killed you!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The spontaneous ignition catches you in its blast! You're engulfed in flames!
qte_context.timeout_message: No time to react! The auto-ignition consumes everything instantly!

mobile_ignition_source_qte.description: A sparking robot vacuum is heading directly toward the gas leak! It's moving on autopilot and you can't stop it remotely!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: ROBOT VACUUM APPROACHING! Type 'intercept vacuum' or 'evacuate room'!
qte_context.success_message: You tackle the sparking vacuum just before it reaches the gas! You wrestle it away from the leak area, saving everyone!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You sprint from the room as the vacuum reaches the gas leak! Behind you, the explosion illuminates your escape!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate about how to stop the vacuum! It reaches the gas and sparks!
qte_context.timeout_message: The robot vacuum completes its programmed path directly into the gas leak. The spark is brilliant and final.

temporary_repair.description: Your makeshift repair on the {object_name} holds for now, but you can hear the pipe groaning under stress. This is clearly a temporary solution at best.

repair_degradation.description: Your temporary repair is beginning to fail. The {object_name} creaks ominously and small wisps of gas are escaping around your repair.

repair_catastrophic_failure.description: Your repair has failed spectacularly! The {object_name} now has multiple ruptures and the gas pressure has dislodged chunks of wall material!

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: Chunks of wall material break free from the damaged area!

makeshift_patch.description: The duct tape over the {object_name} reduces the leak significantly, but the tape is already bulging outward from the pressure. You can hear the adhesive crackling.

patch_pressure_test.description: The duct tape patch is stretched to its limit! It's become a translucent balloon of pressurized gas, pulsing with each surge from the line.

tape_projectile_qte.description: The duct tape is about to fail explosively! It's going to shoot off like a bullet!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: TAPE PROJECTILE! Type 'duck' to avoid it!
qte_context.success_message: You duck as the duct tape shoots across the room like a bullet! It slams into the opposite wall with tremendous force!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The high-pressure duct tape projectile hits you in the head! You're knocked unconscious!
qte_context.timeout_message: Too slow! The tape projectile strikes you down!

unconscious_gas_exposure.description: You're unconscious and breathing gas-laden air! You're slowly being poisoned as the leak continues!
unconscious_gas_exposure.death_message: You never regained consciousness. The gas slowly poisoned you while you lay helpless.

post_explosion_safe.description: The {object_name} is now a charred, twisted mess. The immediate danger has passed, but the room reeks of gas and smoke. Scorch marks cover the walls.

gas_shutoff_success.description: With the main gas supply shut off, the immediate danger subsides. The {object_name} is destroyed, but you've prevented a larger catastrophe.

narrow_escape_success.description: You escaped just in time! Behind you, secondary explosions rock the building, but you're safely away from the devastation.

vacuum_intercept_success.description: You successfully stopped the robotic ignition source! The sparking vacuum is disabled and the gas leak can now be addressed safely.

chemical_escape_success.description: You escaped the toxic chemical reaction! The gas leak continues but you've avoided chemical poisoning.

pressure_relief_success.description: You successfully vented the dangerous pressure buildup! The system is now safe and the gas leak is contained.

explosion_death.description: The gas explosion consumes everything in a brilliant inferno. You had no time to escape.
explosion_death.death_message: Killed instantly in a gas explosion from the {object_name}.

secondary_explosion_death.description: The secondary gas explosion is even more devastating. The entire area becomes an inferno.
secondary_explosion_death.death_message: Killed in a secondary gas explosion after failing to shut off the gas supply.

buried_alive_death.description: Trapped under debris while gas continues to leak, you slowly suffocate in a toxic atmosphere.
buried_alive_death.death_message: Buried alive under debris while toxic gas finished the job.

chemical_poisoning_death.description: The toxic mixture of fire extinguisher chemicals and gas proves fatal. You collapse as your lungs burn from the inside.
chemical_poisoning_death.death_message: Killed by toxic chemical reaction between fire suppressant and natural gas.

spontaneous_ignition_death.description: The spontaneous ignition of super-concentrated gas occurs so quickly that you're vaporized almost instantly.
spontaneous_ignition_death.death_message: Vaporized in a spontaneous gas auto-ignition event.

mobile_ignition_death.description: The sparking robot vacuum completes its deadly path, igniting the gas in a brilliant explosion that consumes everything.
mobile_ignition_death.death_message: Killed when a malfunctioning robot vacuum ignited a gas leak.

gas_poisoning_death.description: You never regained consciousness after being struck down. The gas slowly poisoned you while you lay helpless.
gas_poisoning_death.death_message: Died of gas poisoning while unconscious from a duct tape projectile.

structural_collapse_death.description: The collapsing wall crushes you while simultaneously rupturing the gas line completely. You're buried under rubble in a toxic atmosphere.
structural_collapse_death.death_message: Crushed by structural collapse caused by gas pressure damage.

electrical_gas_explosion_death.description: The meeting of electrical energy and gas creates a devastating explosion. You're at ground zero of a perfect storm.
electrical_gas_explosion_death.death_message: Killed in an electrical cascade gas explosion.

gas_dispersing.description: The ventilation system slowly clears the gas from around the {object_name}, but the leak continues and the fan noise is making the pipe vibrate.

vibration_loosening.description: The vibration from the ventilation system has loosened more fittings! The {object_name} now has multiple small leaks hissing in harmony.

catastrophic_rupture.description: The entire gas line has ruptured catastrophically! Gas is pouring out like a geyser, creating a deadly cloud that's rapidly expanding!
catastrophic_rupture.death_message: The catastrophic gas rupture created a lethal atmosphere that ignited explosively.

sympathetic_explosion.description: The nearby explosion triggers the gas around the {object_name}! A massive secondary blast rocks the entire area!
sympathetic_explosion.death_message: Caught in a catastrophic chain reaction explosion from the {object_name}!

structural_damage_cascade.description: The pressurized gas has been eating away at the wall's structural integrity! Cracks are spreading and the wall is beginning to bow outward!

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The wall can no longer support its own weight!

wall_breach_qte.description: The entire wall section is about to collapse! The gas line will rupture completely when it does!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: WALL COLLAPSE IMMINENT! Type 'brace wall' or 'flee now'!
qte_context.success_message: You brace yourself against the wall, holding it up just long enough to slowly back away! Your quick thinking prevented a catastrophic rupture!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You sprint away as the wall collapses behind you! The gas line ruptures completely but you're safely away!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't decide what to do! The wall collapses on top of you!
qte_context.timeout_message: The wall collapse catches you completely unprepared. You're buried in debris as gas fills the space.

electrical_ignition_cascade.description: Electrical arcing from faulty wiring is creating a cascade of sparks that are being drawn toward the gas leak like a deadly light show!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: ELECTRICAL CASCADE! Type 'cut power' or 'shield yourself'!
qte_context.success_message: You find the electrical panel and kill the power! The sparks die just before reaching the gas concentration!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You cover yourself as the electrical cascade ignites the gas! You're protected from the worst of the blast!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The electrical cascade reaches the gas before you can act! You're caught in the explosion!
qte_context.timeout_message: Electricity and gas meet in a brilliant, deadly display. You're at the center of it.

thermal_expansion_rupture.description: The high room temperature is causing the gas line to expand! The metal is creaking and the fittings are loosening from thermal stress!

thermal_cascade_qte.description: The thermal expansion has reached critical levels! Multiple fittings are beginning to fail simultaneously!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THERMAL CASCADE! Type 'cool system' or 'evacuate immediately'!
qte_context.success_message: You activate emergency cooling systems! The temperature drops and the metal contracts back to safe levels!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You evacuate as multiple fittings fail at once! The room fills with gas but you're safely away!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't stop the thermal cascade! Multiple ruptures occur simultaneously!
qte_context.timeout_message: The thermal expansion reaches its limit. The entire gas system fails catastrophically.

debris_escape_success.description: You successfully crawled to safety beneath the falling debris. The room behind you is completely destroyed.

precarious_escape_success.description: Your risky climb over the debris paid off. You're free, but the route behind you is completely blocked.

evacuation_success.description: You evacuated just in time! The explosion behind you lights up the area, but you're safely away.

projectile_aftermath.description: The duct tape projectile embedded itself in the wall like a bullet. The gas pressure has dropped but the leak continues.

explosive_decompression.description: The pressure release was explosive but controlled. You're thrown back but alive as the system vents violently.

structural_stabilization_success.description: Your quick thinking prevented a complete structural collapse. The wall is stable for now.

power_cutoff_success.description: You successfully cut power to the electrical system, preventing the gas ignition. Crisis averted!

shielded_explosion_survival.description: You protected yourself from the worst of the blast. You're burned and battered but alive.

thermal_control_success.description: Emergency cooling systems prevented the thermal cascade. The gas system is now safe.

mass_rupture_aftermath.description: Multiple gas lines have failed, but you escaped the immediate danger zone.

repair_attempt_failure.description: Your repair attempt backfired catastrophically, making the leak much worse!

violent_rupture.description: Your kick has caused a violent rupture! Gas sprays everywhere with tremendous force!

pressure_explosion_death.description: The pressure buildup reached critical mass and exploded with devastating force.
pressure_explosion_death.death_message: Killed in a pressure explosion after failing to release the gas buildup.

thermal_explosion_sequence.description: The thermal cascade causes multiple simultaneous failures, creating a massive explosion.
thermal_explosion_sequence.death_message: Killed in a thermal cascade explosion of multiple gas line failures.

examine.message: You examine the {object_name} closely. The wood is spongy with rot, and support beams are splintered. As you lean in, a loud *CRACK* echoes from beneath a step.
The {object_name} visibly sag under your gaze. You can see daylight through widening gaps between the steps, and dust rains down from the supports below.

force.message: You put your weight against the {object_name} to test their strength. Massive mistake! The entire structure immediately begins giving way!
You apply force to the already-compromised {object_name}. They collapse instantly beneath you!

run.message: You sprint up the {object_name}, but your rapid footfalls trigger a cascading failure of snapping wood!

climb.message: You attempt to carefully climb the {object_name}, testing each step, but they're more damaged than you thought...

water_damage.message: Water damage accelerates the rot in the {object_name}!

fire_heat.message: The heat weakens the structural integrity of the {object_name}!

stable.description: The {object_name} look ancient and weathered. They creak ominously under the slightest pressure, warning of their fragility.

natural_deterioration.description: Age and neglect have taken their toll on the {object_name}. Several boards show signs of rot, and the handrail wobbles when touched.

creaking.description: The {object_name} groan and shift ominously under any weight. Each step produces an alarming symphony of stressed wood.

stress_fractures.description: Visible cracks spiderweb across the support beams of the {object_name}. The wood groans constantly now, even without weight on it.

critical_warning.description: The {object_name} are on the verge of complete failure! Support beams sag visibly, and a loud CRACK echoes ominously through the structure.

wood_expansion_stress.description: Temperature changes cause the wood of the {object_name} to expand and contract, creating new stress fractures with audible pops and cracks.

rot_acceleration.description: Water damage rapidly accelerates the rot in the {object_name}. You can see the wood visibly deteriorating, becoming soft and spongy.

heat_weakening.description: Heat from a nearby fire weakens the structural adhesives and causes the wood to become brittle. The {object_name} smoke slightly and crack audibly.

imminent_collapse_qte.description: The entire staircase is coming down! You have seconds to act!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THE STAIRS ARE COLLAPSING! Type 'leap back' to escape or 'grab rail' to try holding on!
qte_context.success_message: You leap backward just as the entire staircase collapses with a thunderous crash! You land hard but safely on solid ground.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You grab the handrail as the stairs collapse beneath you! You dangle precariously, but you're alive. Now you need to pull yourself up...
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate a moment too long! The stairs give way completely, sending you tumbling into the debris below!

hanging_rescue_qte.description: Your muscles scream as you hang from the wobbly handrail, splinters digging into your palms. The entire wall groans under your weight!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: GRIP FAILING! Type 'pull up' repeatedly to climb to safety!
qte_context.success_message: With tremendous effort, you haul yourself up and over the handrail! Your arms burn, but you've made it to the upper landing.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: Your strength gives out! You lose your grip and fall into the wreckage below!

precarious_landing.description: You collapse onto the upper landing, chest heaving with relief. But your desperate climb has stressed the old building. A heavy, ornate light fixture groans ominously overhead, dislodged by the vibrations of your rescue!

final_surprise_qte.description: The light fixture breaks free and plummets towards you!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: DODGE THE FALLING FIXTURE!
qte_context.success_message: You roll aside as the heavy fixture shatters on the floor, spraying glass and metal where your head was moments before. Silence. It's finally over.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: Exhausted from the climb, you can't react in time. The fixture strikes you with crushing force.

violent_collapse_qte.description: Your force triggers an immediate, violent collapse! The entire structure gives way at once!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: VIOLENT COLLAPSE! Type 'dive away' to escape the falling debris!
qte_context.success_message: You dive away as the staircase explodes into splinters! A beam crashes where you were standing moments ago.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You're caught in the collapse! Falling timber and debris rain down on you!

instant_collapse_qte.description: The compromised stairs collapse instantly beneath you! There's no time to think!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: INSTANT COLLAPSE! Type 'jump' NOW!
qte_context.success_message: Pure instinct saves you! You leap forward just as the floor gives way, landing on the upper landing with a painful thud.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You fall with the collapsing stairs! The world becomes a chaos of splintering wood and crushing weight!

chase_collapse_qte.description: As you run, the stairs collapse behind you in a chain reaction! The failure is chasing you up!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THE COLLAPSE IS CHASING YOU! Type 'sprint up' to outrun it!
qte_context.success_message: You sprint up the disintegrating stairs, staying just ahead of the cascade of destruction! You reach the top as the last step crumbles behind you!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The collapse catches up to you! The stairs disintegrate beneath your feet!

careful_ascent_qte.description: You try to distribute your weight carefully, testing each step, but the stairs are more damaged than you thought!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: TEST EACH STEP! Type 'step light' to move carefully!
qte_context.success_message: Your careful approach pays off! You detect the weak spots and navigate around them, reaching the top safely.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: Despite your caution, you step on a particularly rotten board! It gives way, sending you tumbling!

partial_collapse_injured.description: You're injured but alive in the debris. The pain is intense, but you can still move.

debris_extraction_qte.description: You're trapped under debris from the collapsed stairs! You need to free yourself before more of the structure fails!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: TRAPPED IN DEBRIS! Type 'push beam' to free yourself!
qte_context.success_message: With tremendous effort, you push aside the heavy beam and crawl out of the wreckage! You're hurt but free.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't move the debris! As you struggle, you hear more of the structure beginning to fail above you...

death_by_collapse.description: The world becomes a storm of splintering wood and crushing weight. There is no escape.
death_by_collapse.death_message: Crushed in the catastrophic collapse of the rotted staircase.

death_by_fall_into_debris.description: Your strength gives out. You plummet into the jagged wreckage below, the sharp ends of broken beams ensuring your end is swift and brutal.
death_by_fall_into_debris.death_message: Fell from the broken handrail into the debris of the collapsed stairs.

death_by_irony.description: You pulled yourself to safety, only to become the target for Death's next move. The heavy light fixture strikes you with perfect, grim precision.
death_by_irony.death_message: Killed by a falling light fixture immediately after surviving a staircase collapse. Ironic.

death_by_instant_collapse.description: The instant collapse of the stairs crushes you beneath tons of wood and debris. There was no time to react, no chance to escape.
death_by_instant_collapse.death_message: Crushed instantly in the catastrophic collapse of the rotted staircase.

secondary_collapse_death.description: Unable to free yourself from the initial debris, you're helpless as a secondary structural failure buries you completely.
secondary_collapse_death.death_message: Buried alive in a secondary collapse while trapped in stair debris.

collapsed.description: The {object_name} are now a pile of broken timbers, splintered wood, and twisted nails. The wreckage completely blocks the way, and the smell of old rot fills the air. A thick cloud of ancient dust chokes the atmosphere.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.trigger_message: The violent collapse shakes the entire structure!

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The stair collapse has compromised the building's structural integrity!
A thick cloud of dust and debris fills the air!

examine.message: You look closer at the {object_name} near the {support_object}. The corrosion is worse than you thought; the steady drip is accelerating into a constant trickle.

repair.message: Using your tools, you manage to tighten the fitting. The leak slows to an occasional drop. It's a temporary fix, but should hold for now.
It's too late for tools! Water is spraying everywhere with immense force!

block.message: You wrap a cloth tightly around the {object_name}, successfully stopping the leak. A moment of relief is shattered by the sound of the pipe groaning ominously as pressure builds behind your makeshift patch.

hit.message: In a moment of frustration, you strike the pipe. A loud CRACK echoes in the room as a hairline fracture spiders across its surface before it fails completely!

structural_vibration.message: The vibrations cause the aging {object_name} to shudder, worsening the leak.

explosion_nearby.message: The concussive blast from the explosion ruptures the {object_name}!

extreme_cold_source.message: The intense cold from the {target_hazard_object} freezes the water from the {source_hazard_object}, sealing the leak with a growing plug of solid ice.

dripping.description: A rhythmic *plink... plink...* sound comes from a {object_name} on the {support_object}. A small, dark puddle is forming below.

flowing.description: The {object_name} at the {support_object} now has a steady stream of water pouring from it, creating a growing puddle.

pressure_warning.description: The flow from the {object_name} intensifies! You hear the metal of the pipe pinging and groaning under immense pressure. It's about to fail!

burst_qte.description: The pipe is screaming with pressure! You have seconds to act before it ruptures!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: PIPE FAILURE IMMINENT! Type 'shut off valve' or 'take cover'!
qte_context.success_message: You lunge for a nearby shutoff valve and crank it closed! The groaning stops and the flow is cut off. Crisis averted.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You dive behind cover as the pipe explodes in a violent geyser of water and shrapnel! You're soaked but alive as the room begins to flood.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate too long! The pipe ruptures with explosive force, blasting you off your feet!

burst_player_injured.description: The pipe explosion sends you sprawling! You're soaked and bruised, and the room is rapidly flooding around you.

flood_escape_qte.description: Water is rising rapidly! You need to escape before the room becomes completely submerged!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: RISING WATER! Type 'swim for it' or 'climb furniture'!
qte_context.success_message: You fight the churning water and swim for the exit, escaping just as the room becomes impassable.
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You scramble onto a sturdy piece of furniture, getting above the worst of the flood. You're safe for now, but stranded.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The current is too strong! The rising water pulls you under...

blocked_pressure_buildup.description: Your makeshift patch is holding, but the pipe is visibly bulging and groaning. The pressure is becoming immense.

pressure_explosion_qte.description: Your patch suddenly sprays a fine mist! It's about to fail explosively!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: PATCH FAILING! Type 'dive away'!
qte_context.success_message: You dive away as your patch fails! The cloth shoots off like a bullet, followed by a high-pressure jet of water!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The pressurized water blast hits you full force, sending you tumbling across the room!

jet_ricochet.description: You avoid the initial blast, but the high-pressure jet of water slams into a sparking electrical outlet on the far wall!

frozen_solid.description: The leaking pipe is now completely encased in a thick layer of glistening ice. The dripping has stopped, but the pipe is audibly groaning and creaking as pressure builds behind the ice dam.

pressure_shatter_qte.description: With a terrifying PING, a long fracture appears in the ice and the metal pipe beneath! It's about to shatter from the pressure!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THE PIPE IS SHATTERING! Type 'shield face' to protect from shrapnel!
qte_context.success_message: You throw your arms over your face just as the frozen pipe explodes, sending ice and metal shrapnel flying past you!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You react too slowly. A shard of frozen metal, sharp as a razor, slices across your throat.

emergency_shutoff_success.description: You successfully shut off the water. The room is damp, but you prevented a flood.

narrow_flood_escape.description: You barely escaped the flooding room. Behind you, water continues to pour, turning it into a deathtrap.

high_ground_refuge.description: From your perch, you watch the water level stabilize. You're safe for now, but stranded until the water recedes.

contained_flood_aftermath.description: The initial crisis is over, but the room is now dangerously wet and filled with new hazards.

temporarily_fixed.description: Your repair work has stopped the leak, but it's a temporary solution.

death_by_drowning.description: The rushing water overwhelms you. You're swept under and drown in the churning, indoor flood.
death_by_drowning.death_message: Drowned in a flood caused by catastrophic pipe failure.

death_by_shrapnel.description: The shrapnel from the exploding frozen pipe is lethally sharp. You bleed out in seconds.
death_by_shrapnel.death_message: Killed by shrapnel from an exploding frozen pipe.

swinging_for_qte.description: As you step toward the street, a shadow detaches from a construction crane parked across the way. A massive wrecking ball swings silently and directly towards you!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: A WRECKING BALL IS HURTLING TOWARDS YOU! 'DODGE' TO SIDESTEP OR 'DIVE' FOR A MORE DESPERATE LEAP!
qte_context.success_message: You lunge aside, the wind from the passing wrecking ball tearing at your clothes! It smashes through the porch where you were standing, sending splinters everywhere...
qte_context.alternative_success_message: With a desperate, sprawling dive, you hit the dirt hard as the wrecking ball screams through the space your head occupied moments before! It obliterates the porch with a deafening CRUNCH.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You freeze for a fraction of a second too long. The wrecking ball connects with a sickening, final thud, turning you into little more than a red stain on its grim surface.

return_swing_warning.description: The massive wrecking ball, having demolished the house's facade, reaches the apex of its swing. The chain groans as it reverses direction, racing back towards you with terrifying speed!

return_swing_qte.description: The wrecking ball hurtles back toward you with unstoppable momentum!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THE BALL IS SWINGING BACK! DODGE AGAIN!
qte_context.success_message: You scramble backwards as the wrecking ball whooshes past, missing you by inches! The impact has severely damaged the front of the house...
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You can't escape the return arc. The wrecking ball catches you as you try to stand, and all you see is darkness.

falling_facade_qte.description: You survived the ball, but the impacts have shattered the house's structural integrity. A heavy decorative gutter, torn loose from the roof, plummets down directly towards you!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: DEBRIS FALLING! JUMP BACK!
qte_context.success_message: You leap back as the iron gutter impales the ground where you stood. The area is finally silent.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You look up just in time to see the jagged piece of iron fill your vision.

miraculous_escape_positioning.description: Your desperate dive took you further away from the house, giving you a precious extra second. As the wrecking ball completes its return swing, you hear a high-pitched SCREECH of tortured metal from the crane itself!

cable_snap_qte.description: The main cable holding the ball begins to smoke and unravel with a series of sharp, whip-like cracks! The entire wrecking ball is about to plummet to the ground!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THE CABLE IS BREAKING! Type 'run' to sprint to safety!
qte_context.success_message: You sprint away just as the cable snaps completely! The wrecking ball crashes to the ground behind you with earth-shaking force. You've escaped.
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate, misjudging the danger. The falling wrecking ball finds its mark after all.

impact_floor_break.description: Your combined weight is too much for the rotted porch! With a sharp crack, the floorboards give way and you stumble into the space beneath. As you look up, dazed, you see the massive wrecking ball swing silently through the space you just occupied... directly into you.
impact_floor_break.death_message: The collapsing porch didn't kill you, but it put you right in Death's path. The wrecking ball finishes the job.

level_complete_survival.description: You stand panting, adrenaline coursing through you, amid the wreckage of Bludworth's porch. The crane operator, horrified, quickly secures the crane and drives away before anyone can ask questions. You're alive... and you have a new destination in mind.

obliterated_by_first_swing.description: Your hesitation was fatal. The world dissolves into a symphony of crushing force and blinding pain.
obliterated_by_first_swing.death_message: Obliterated by the initial swing of the wrecking ball.

impact_return_swing_death.description: The return swing was faster, more brutal. You couldn't react in time.
impact_return_swing_death.death_message: You cheated death for a second, but it always comes back around. The returning wrecking ball obliterates you.

death_by_falling_debris.description: After all that, it wasn't the ball that got you. A jagged piece of the house's own facade, shaken loose by the chaos, plummets down and ends your story with an abrupt, brutal impact.
death_by_falling_debris.death_message: Killed by falling debris after surviving the wrecking ball.

death_by_falling_ball.description: The massive wrecking ball plummets from the broken crane, crushing you beneath its tremendous weight. So close to escape, yet Death found a way.
death_by_falling_ball.death_message: Crushed by a falling wrecking ball after the crane cable snapped.

examine.message: The {object_name} looks old and dusty. The power cord is frayed and the plastic casing is brittle with age and stress cracks.

use.message: You try to use the {object_name}. It sputters, sparks ominously, and a wisp of acrid smoke escapes!
You foolishly touch the violently sparking {object_name}! It immediately detonates in your face!

unplug.message: You wisely and carefully unplug the {object_name} from the wall. The immediate electrical danger is eliminated.
You lunge for the cord, yanking it from the socket just before the {object_name} fails completely. The sparking stops.
unplug.failure_message: You reach for the plug, but a violent arc of electricity leaps to your hand, forcing you back!

water_puddle_contact.message: The sparking appliance makes contact with the water, instantly electrifying the entire puddle!

power_surge_event.message: A power surge courses through the building, causing the {object_name} to glow and hum violently!

spreading_fire_heat.message: The intense heat from a nearby fire begins to melt the {object_name}'s casing!

structural_vibration.message: Heavy vibrations shake the {object_name}, causing its damaged internals to spark.

flickering.description: The {object_name} on the {support_object} flickers erratically, its power light blinking. It makes a faint, high-pitched buzzing sound.

malfunctioning.description: The {object_name} on the {support_object} is smoking and letting out a loud, insistent crackle as sparks jump from its chassis!

gas_leak.message: The continuous sparks from the {source_hazard_object} find the gas from the {target_hazard_object}...

water_puddle.message: A powerful spark from the {source_hazard_object} arcs into the nearby water!

critical_warning.description: The {object_name} shrieks with a high-frequency squeal! The crackling of electricity intensifies and the smell of burning ozone fills the air. It's about to blow!

explosive_malfunction_qte.description: The {object_name} is glowing red-hot, about to explode!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: IT'S GOING TO EXPLODE! Type 'dive for cover' to escape, or 'use [item]' to try and contain it!
qte_context.success_message: You dive behind cover just as the {object_name} detonates in a violent shower of sparks and shrapnel!

fire extinguisher.success_message: You blast the {object_name} with the extinguisher! The chemical foam smothers the overload, and with a final pathetic fizzle, it dies.

crowbar.failure_message: In a panic, you smash the {object_name} with the crowbar! It triggers a violent electrical discharge that arcs up the metal tool and into you!

use_item_outcomes.default_item_failure_message: You try to use the {item_name}, but it's useless! The {object_name} explodes!

qte_context.timeout_message: You freeze as the {object_name} detonates in a flash of light and searing heat!

explosion_consequences.description: The {object_name} has exploded, scattering burning debris. Some pieces are still sparking dangerously, and small fires are starting to catch.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The hot debris from the explosion ignites flammable material in the room!
The force of the blast shakes a light fixture loose from the ceiling!

explosion_player_injured.description: You took the brunt of the explosion! Burning shrapnel peppers your body and the room around you is now on fire.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The room erupts into flames around you!

contained_success.description: Your quick thinking with the fire extinguisher completely neutralized the threat. The room is filled with chemical foam, but you are safe.

contained_failure_electrocution.description: The metal crowbar was the absolute worst choice. A massive electrical charge surges through it, stopping your heart instantly.
contained_failure_electrocution.death_message: Electrocuted after smashing a short-circuiting appliance with a crowbar.

unplugged_safe.description: The {object_name} is unplugged and inert. Crisis averted.

broken_electrified.description: The {object_name} on the {support_object} is a sizzling, sparking mess, sitting in an electrified pool of water.
broken_electrified.death_message: You make contact with the electrified water. The shock is instantly fatal.

jarred_loose.description: After being jarred, the {object_name} sparks once then falls silent. It seems to have broken harmlessly.

structural_vibration.message: The vibrations cause the {object_name} to wobble dangerously!

explosion_nearby.message: The concussive blast dislodges the {object_name}, sending it plummeting!

player_bump_support.message: You bump into the {support_object}, and the {object_name} on it shifts alarmingly.

examine.message: As you get a closer look, you notice just how unstable the {object_name} is. Your movement seems to make it worse.

take.message: You reach for the {object_name}, but your touch is enough to send it toppling over the edge!

precarious.description: A {object_name} rests precariously on the {support_object}, looking like it could fall at any moment.
precarious.player_guidance: That {object_name} looks unstable. Vibrations could be dangerous.

wobbling.description: The {object_name} on the {support_object} is wobbling dangerously, on the verge of falling!
wobbling.player_guidance: DANGER: The {object_name} is becoming very unstable. Move carefully.

falling_qte.description: The {object_name} topples from the {support_object} and plummets towards you!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: A {projectile_name} is falling toward you! DODGE or take COVER!
qte_context.success_message: You leap aside as the {projectile_name} smashes on the floor where you were standing!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You throw yourself under nearby cover as the {projectile_name} smashes down, showering you with debris!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate for a fatal moment as the {projectile_name} comes crashing down!
qte_context.timeout_message: You freeze in terror as the {projectile_name} plummets toward you!
qte_context.death_message_on_hp_loss: The massive {projectile_name} crushes you instantly. Death via blunt force trauma was mercifully quick.

fallen_debris.description: The shattered remains of the {object_name} lie on the floor near the {support_object}, creating a field of dangerous debris.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The heavy impact of the {source_object_name} cracks the floorboards!
The impact ruptures a gas line hidden in the floor!

fallen_cover_damage.description: The {object_name} lies shattered. You are safe under your cover, but some debris still hit you.

fallen_player_hit.description: The shattered remains of the {object_name} lie on the floor. The impact has left you severely injured.

flying.description: A {object_name} rockets through the air in {room_name}!

ricochet.description: The {object_name} ricochets wildly, smashing into walls and equipment!

context.success_message: You duck just in time as it whistles past!
context.failure_message: It clips you hard on the rebound!

spent.description: The {object_name} clatters to the floor, momentum gone.

gas_leak.message: The collapsing structure ruptures a nearby gas pipe!

faulty_wiring.message: The collapse severs electrical conduits, causing wires to arc dangerously!

minor_damage.description: Fine cracks snake across the {object_name}, and a steady rain of dust falls from above. The structure occasionally emits unsettling creaks.

stressed_supports.description: The {object_name} groans loudly and constantly. Larger pieces of debris now fall, and the cracks have widened into fissures.

imminent_collapse_qte.description: The structure is failing! A deafening roar fills the air as the {object_name} begins to buckle and give way!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: THE ROOM IS COLLAPSING! RUN FOR AN EXIT!
qte_context.success_message: You sprint through an exit just as the room caves in behind you!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: There's no time to escape! The entire structure comes down on top of you!

major_collapse_death.description: The entire room is a storm of falling concrete and twisted metal. It is unsurvivable.
major_collapse_death.death_message: You are buried under tons of rubble in the structural collapse.

collapsed_ruins.description: The room is a ruin, filled with impassable debris and choking dust. The way is blocked.

immediate_room.message: The collapse ruptures gas lines in the walls!
Electrical systems are torn apart by the collapse!

adjacent_rooms.message: The shockwave destabilizes objects in nearby rooms!
The structural failure is spreading to adjacent rooms!

building_wide.message: The structural damage causes a power surge throughout the entire hospital!

escalation_logic.message: As you approach the hospital exit, the revolving door begins to spin faster than normal. Something is very wrong.

examine.message: The hospital exit looks normal, a standard revolving door. The massive hospital sign hangs above, seemingly secure.
The revolving door is malfunctioning severely, spinning erratically or with warped blades. It's a death trap!
The massive hospital sign above groans ominously. One half is clearly compromised, held by supports deformed by the earlier magnetic forces. It looks like it could fall at any moment.
A severed power line whips through the air like an electric serpent! Sparks arc from its exposed end as it swings toward you with lethal voltage!
The gas meter is ruptured, and gas is pouring out! Sparks from the damaged electrical line continue to arc nearby. An explosion is imminent!
The emergency generator is smoking and sparking violently! It's clearly overloaded and about to explode!

interact_door.message: You try to manually jam the spinning door with your wrench. It grinds and squeals, then slowly comes to a halt.
interact_door.success_message: The door is jammed and safe.
interact_door.failure_message: The wrench slips, or the door is too powerful! You're almost caught in the mechanism!

interact_door.message: You attempt to force the malfunctioning door open with brute strength! This is extremely risky!

interact_sign.message: You manage to tie a rope around the unstable part of the hospital sign and secure it to a lamppost, bracing it against collapse.
interact_sign.failure_message: The rope slips, or isn't strong enough! The sign groans ominously and shifts further!

interact_sign.message: You attempt to cut the remaining supports of the hospital sign, hoping to make it fall safely away from the exit!

interact_cable.message: Using insulated pliers, you carefully snip the live electrical cable, cutting its power!
interact_cable.failure_message: The pliers slip! You get a painful shock!

interact_cable.message: You quickly wrap insulating tape around the exposed section of the whipping cable, hoping to contain the electrical threat!
interact_cable.failure_message: The tape tears, or you miss! The cable remains dangerous!

interact_gas_meter.message: You desperately try to seal the ruptured gas meter with your wrench, hoping to stop the leak!
interact_gas_meter.failure_message: The wrench slips! The leak worsens, and sparks fly!

interact_gas_meter.message: You spray the fire extinguisher at the gas leak, hoping to smother any potential ignition sources!

interact_generator.message: You attempt an emergency shutdown of the overloading generator with your multi-tool!
interact_generator.failure_message: The multi-tool sparks, or the controls are jammed! The generator continues to overload!

interact_generator.message: You deliberately throw a conductive liquid onto the overloading generator, hoping to cause a controlled short circuit!

mri.message: The aftermath of the MRI incident triggers a chain reaction at the hospital exit!

spreading_fire.message: The heat and smoke from the {target_hazard_object} affect the hospital exit, causing further malfunctions!

structural_damage.message: Structural damage from the {target_hazard_object} further compromises the hospital exit!

faulty_wiring.message: The {target_hazard_object} causes a power surge at the hospital exit, worsening the electrical hazards!

gas_leak.message: The {target_hazard_object} interacts with the damaged electrical line, causing a massive gas explosion!

off.description: The hospital exit is currently inactive, waiting for a trigger to begin its sequence.

door_starts_spinning.description: The revolving door begins to spin faster than normal. Something is very wrong. The massive hospital sign above groans ominously.

sign_unstable.description: The massive hospital sign from above groans - an unwitting victim of the MRI incident from earlier; one half now being held by supports deformed by the magnetic forces that, so far today, have already almost caused your death once.
