With the snap and ricochet of a few nuts and bolts shearing apart due to the newly distributed load, one final groan -and an extremely eerily pronounced silence- one of the giant 'Hospital' sign letters breaks loose and plummets toward you!

falling_sign_qte.description: A massive hospital sign is falling toward you! DODGE quickly!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: A massive hospital sign is falling toward you! DODGE, DIVE or step BACK!
success_messages: You leap out of the way as the sign crashes down!
You dive forward, narrowly avoiding the sign!
You step back just as the sign slams down!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The sign crushes you!

dodge_success_forward.description: You leap forward as the sign crashes behind you. The revolving door is still spinning wildly, but you're clear of the sign. However, your forward momentum carries you toward the malfunctioning door!

dodge_success_dive.description: You dive forward, rolling past the falling sign. But your dive takes you directly into the path of the spinning revolving door! The metal blades whir menacingly as you approach.

dodge_success_back.description: You step back just as the sign crashes down. The impact shatters the sidewalk and sends debris flying. A chunk of concrete ricochets off the sign and strikes a power line overhead! Sparks rain down as the electrical cable whips toward you!

door_entrapment_qte.description: The revolving door's compartments are spinning too fast! You need to react quickly to avoid being crushed between the glass panels!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: The door spins toward you! PRESS SPACE at the exact moment the gap aligns!
qte_context.success_message: You react with perfect timing and slip through the door as the gap appears!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You mistime your entry and the spinning door catches you between its panels!

spinning_blade_qte.description: The door's metal frame has warped, creating razor-sharp edges that spin like a blender! You're on a collision course with this mechanical death trap!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: The door is a spinning death trap! Type: SLIDE UNDER or LEAP OVER
qte_context.success_message: You slide beneath the spinning blades and emerge safely on the other side!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You leap over the door mechanism, landing hard but safely outside!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The spinning blades catch you as you hesitate!

electrical_cable_qte.description: The severed power line whips through the air like an electric serpent! Sparks arc from its exposed end as it swings toward you with lethal voltage!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: LIVE WIRE! Type 'jump' to avoid electrocution!
qte_context.success_message: You leap over the whipping electrical cable! It strikes the ground where you stood, leaving a smoking crater!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You drop flat as the cable whips overhead! You feel the heat of the electrical discharge!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The live wire strikes you with devastating electrical force!

electrical_dodge_success.description: You've avoided the electrical cable, but it's still whipping around wildly! As you try to reach the exit, the cable strikes a nearby gas meter with a brilliant flash!

electrical_duck_success.description: You duck under the cable, but your position puts you right next to the hospital's emergency generator! The electrical surge from the damaged line overloads the generator, and it begins to smoke and spark ominously!

gas_explosion_qte.description: The electrical cable has ruptured the gas meter! You can smell the gas and see vapors rising as sparks continue to arc from the damaged line! Ignition is imminent!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: GAS LEAK + SPARKS = EXPLOSION! Type 'RUN' now!
qte_context.success_message: You sprint away as the gas ignites in a massive fireball behind you! The explosion propels you forward, but you survive!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate! The gas explosion engulfs you!

generator_explosion_qte.description: The overloaded generator is about to explode! Electrical components are popping and smoking, and you can hear the high-pitched whine of capacitors reaching critical charge!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: GENERATOR OVERLOAD! Type 'take cover' or 'run away'!
qte_context.success_message: You dive behind a concrete barrier as the generator explodes! Shrapnel flies overhead, but you're protected!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You sprint away as the generator detonates! The blast wave knocks you down, but you're far enough away to survive!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The generator explodes before you can react!

door_jammed_safe.description: You successfully jammed the revolving door. It's now safely stuck, allowing you to pass through the gaps between panels.

door_jammed_fail_entrapment.description: Your attempt to jam the door failed, and you're caught between its rapidly spinning panels!
door_jammed_fail_entrapment.death_message: Crushed by a malfunctioning revolving door after a failed attempt to jam it.

sign_secured_success.description: You successfully secured the hospital sign. It no longer poses a falling hazard.

sign_cut_away_qte.description: You've cut the sign's remaining supports! It's now falling, but you need to dodge clear!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: SIGN FALLING! DODGE!
qte_context.success_message: You leap clear as the sign crashes down where you were standing!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The falling sign hits you!

cable_cut_safe.description: You successfully cut the live electrical cable. It now lies harmlessly on the ground, no longer a threat.

cable_insulated_safe.description: You successfully insulated the electrical cable. It's still live, but no longer a direct electrocution risk.

gas_vented_success.description: You successfully vented the gas leak from the meter. The immediate explosion risk is gone.

gas_extinguished_qte.description: You sprayed the fire extinguisher at the gas leak. The immediate sparks are gone, but gas is still leaking!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: GAS STILL LEAKING! Type 'seal' or 'flee'!
qte_context.success_message: You quickly seal the leak, preventing further danger!
qte_context.alternative_success_message: You flee the area, leaving the leaking gas behind!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: You hesitate, and the gas ignites!

generator_disabled_success.description: You successfully disabled the emergency generator. The immediate threat of explosion is gone.

generator_sabotage_qte.description: You deliberately overloaded the generator! It's about to explode, but you need to get clear!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: GENERATOR EXPLODING! DODGE!
qte_context.success_message: You leap clear as the generator detonates!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The explosion catches you!

safe_exit_ending.description: You've successfully navigated the malfunctioning revolving door! Outside, you collapse to your knees, gasping. Behind you, the door finally jams with a grinding shriek of metal. You've escaped the hospital's deadly farewell, but barely. Death's design was intricate, but not perfect.

narrow_escape_ending.description: You slide under the spinning death trap and roll to safety outside! Your clothes are torn and you have several cuts, but you're alive. The revolving door finally seizes up with a metallic scream. You realize how close Death came to claiming you - the spinning blades missed you by millimeters.

athletic_escape_ending.description: Your desperate leap clears the spinning mechanism entirely! You land hard on the concrete outside, rolling with the impact. Behind you, the door's motor finally burns out with a shower of sparks. You've outmaneuvered Death's mechanical trap through pure athleticism and quick thinking.

explosion_survivor_ending.description: The blast wave from the gas explosion launches you through the air, but also propels you clear of the hospital grounds! You land painfully in the parking lot, singed and battered but miraculously alive. Behind you, the hospital's rear entrance is now a smoking crater. Death's elaborate chain reaction worked almost perfectly - almost.

shrapnel_survivor_ending.description: Protected behind the concrete barrier, you weather the generator explosion. Metal fragments embed in the barrier inches from your head. When the smoke clears, you emerge shaken but unharmed. The hospital's power grid is completely destroyed, plunging the building into darkness. You've survived Death's electrical gambit.

blast_wave_ending.description: The generator's explosion knocks you flat, but you're far enough away to survive. Debris rains down around you as you struggle to your feet. Your ears are ringing and you taste blood, but you're breathing. The hospital behind you is now partially collapsed and completely dark. Death's power play failed by mere seconds.

death_by_sign_crush.description: The massive hospital sign crashes down with the force of a guillotine. Your last thought is wonder at how something so routine as a hospital exit could become so deadly. The sign's impact creates a crater in the sidewalk, and you are buried beneath its weight.
death_by_sign_crush.death_message: Crushed by a falling hospital sign while attempting to exit through a revolving door.

door_crush_death.description: The revolving door's compartments squeeze together with hydraulic force, trapping you between the thick glass panels. The mechanism continues to spin, grinding inexorably. Your muffled screams are lost in the mechanical whirring. Death's revolving door becomes your glass coffin.
door_crush_death.death_message: Crushed between the glass panels of a malfunctioning revolving door.

blade_death.description: The spinning metal edges of the warped door catch you in their deadly rotation. What should have been a simple exit becomes a mechanical meat grinder. The door continues to spin, painting its glass panels red as it completes Death's most visceral design.
blade_death.death_message: Shredded by the razor-sharp edges of a malfunctioning revolving door.

electrocution_death.description: The severed power line strikes you with thousands of volts. Your body convulses as electricity courses through you, and the sweet smell of ozone fills the air. The cable continues to whip and spark, but you are beyond caring. Death's electrical finale is swift and merciless.
electrocution_death.death_message: Electrocuted by a severed power line caused by falling hospital debris.

gas_explosion_death.description: The gas ignites in a brilliant orange fireball that consumes everything within a thirty-foot radius. You are vaporized instantly, becoming part of the expanding cloud of superheated gas. Death's chain reaction reaches its explosive crescendo with you at ground zero.
gas_explosion_death.death_message: Vaporized in a gas explosion triggered by electrical damage from falling hospital debris.

generator_explosion_death.description: The generator detonates like a bomb, sending metal shrapnel in all directions. A jagged piece of the generator housing strikes you in the chest with the force of a cannon ball. Death's electrical trap delivers its final, devastating payload.
generator_explosion_death.death_message: Killed by shrapnel from an exploding emergency generator.

extreme_cold_source.name: Extreme Cold Source
object_name_options: a hissing canister of liquid nitrogen

water_puddle.message: The intense cold from the {source_hazard_object} freezes the {target_hazard_object} solid!

leaking_vapor.description: A faint, cold mist escapes from the {object_name}, chilling the air around it.

frosting_surfaces.description: The cold from the {object_name} is intensifying. A thick layer of frost coats nearby surfaces.

hypothermia_onset.description: The air is now painfully cold. Your fingers and toes feel numb, and you can't stop shivering. The frost on the walls is creeping further out.
hypothermia_onset.player_guidance: DANGER: You are suffering from hypothermia. Your health will drain until you leave or find warmth.

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The extreme cold causes nearby metal water pipes to contract and shatter!
Windows and glass surfaces shatter from the thermal shock!

flash_freeze_qte.description: A seal on the {object_name} fails catastrophically! A wave of supercooled gas erupts into the room, flash-freezing everything it touches!

qte_context.ui_prompt_message: FLASH FREEZE! Type 'endure' repeatedly to fight the cold!
qte_context.success_message: Through sheer willpower, you keep your muscles moving, generating just enough heat to survive the worst of the freeze!
qte_context.failure_message_wrong_input: The agonizing cold seeps into your bones, locking your muscles. You can't fight it...

expended.description: The {object_name} stops releasing cold vapor. The intense chill begins to slowly recede, leaving a room coated in thick ice.

frozen_death.description: Your body, a brittle statue of ice, stands frozen in the center of the room.
frozen_death.death_message: The flash freeze instantly crystallizes the moisture in your lungs and on your skin. Your body shatters like glass in the extreme cold. It is an agonizing, final sensation.

idle.description: The elevator hums quietly. It seems safe... for now.

shaking.description: The elevator lurches violently! Cables groan above.

context.ui_prompt_message: The elevator jerks violently! Maintain balance!
context.success_message: You brace yourself as the elevator rattles.
context.failure_message: You slam into the wall painfully!

cable_snap.description: A horrific snap echoes above. The elevator plunges downward!

context.ui_prompt_message: The elevator is falling! Try to force the doors or climb!
context.success_message: You wrench the doors open just enough to glimpse the floor rushing by!
context.failure_message: You cant force the doors! The plunge continues!

plunge.description: The elevator screams downward at breakneck speed!

impact.description: With a deafening crash, the elevator slams into the shaft bottom.
impact.death_message: The elevator slams into the ground floor, crushing you in a catastrophic collapse.

hissing.description: A high-pressure hiss escapes the {object_name}. The air smells sharp and cold.

pressure_jet.description: The tanks valve fails! A white plume jets sideways with terrifying force!

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The leaking tank rockets across the room like a torpedo!

depressurized.description: The tank spins to a halt, pressure spent.

flickering.description: The generator sputters, causing the lights on the game to flicker.

sparking_intermittently.description: The generator now emits occasional, sharp zaps of electricity.

major_short_circuit.description: With a loud POP, the generator shorts out completely, sending a powerful electrical charge down its main cable!

triggers_hazard_on_state_change.message: The electrical surge travels down the cable and into the wet ground, energizing the nearby metal fence!

live_and_arcing.description: The metal fence is now live, electricity arcing dangerously where it touches the damp ground.

prize_bull.message: The live current shocks the prize bull!

docile.description: The bull chews its cud, occasionally snorting.

panicked.description: Zapped with electricity, the bull bellows in pain and rage!

stable.description: The food stall seems sturdy enough.

collapsing.description: The supports give way and the entire food stall comes crashing down!

spreading.description: Screaming hot oil from the deep fryers spreads rapidly across the ground.

propane_tanks.message: The searing hot oil melts the valves on the propane tanks...

stable.description: Several large propane tanks sit ready for the grills.

ignited.description: The leaking propane ignites in a massive, fiery explosion that tears the midway apart!
